GSP33brssbh4u:4: tṛtīye adhyāye parā aparāsu vidyāsu sādhana āśrayo vicāraḥ prāyeṇātyagāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:7: prathamaṃ tāvat katibhiḥ cidadhikaraṇaiḥ sādhana āśrayavicāraśeṣameva anusarāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:8: 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.21)
GSP33brssbh4u:11: iti ca evamādiśravaṇeṣu saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ sakṛt pratyayaḥ kartavya āhosvit āvṛttya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:12: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ sakṛt pratyayaḥ syāt prayājādivat /
GSP33brssbh4u:15: nanu asakṛt upadeśā udāhṛtāḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavya iti evamādayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:16: evam api yāvat śabdam āvartayet sakṛt śravaṇaṃ sakṛt mananaṃ sakṛt nididhyāsanaṃ ca iti na atiriktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:17: sakṛt upadeśeṣu tu veda upāsīta iti evamādiṣu anāvṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:20: 'śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' iti evañjātīyako hi asakṛt upadeśaḥ pratyayāvṛttiṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:21: nanu uktaṃ yāvat śabdameva āvartayet na adhikam iti / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:23: darśanaparyavasānāni hi śravaṇādīni āvartyamānāni dṛṣṭārthāni bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:25: api ca upāsanaṃ nididhyāsanaṃ ca iti atyantarṇītāvṛttiguṇa eva kriyābhidhīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:26: tathā hi - loke gurum upāste rājānam upāsta iti ca yaḥ tātparyeṇa gurvādīn anuvartate sa evam ucyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:27: tathā dhyāyati proṣitanāthā patim iti yā nirantara smaraṇā patiṃ prati sā utkaṇṭhā sā evam abhidhīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:28: vidyupāstyoḥ ca vedānteṣu avyatirekeṇa prayogo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:29: kvacit vidinā upakramya upāsina upasaṃharati yathā - 'yastadveda yatsa veda sa mayaitaduktaḥ' (chā. 4.1.4)
GSP33brssbh4u:30: iti atra 'anu ma etāṃ bhagavo devatāṃ śādhi yāṃ devatāmupāḥse' (chā. 5.2.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:31: kvacit ca upāsina upakramya vidinā upasaṃharati yathā - 'mano brahmetyupāsīta' (chā. 3.18.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:32: iti atra 'bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda' (chā. 3.18.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:39: iti raśmibahutva vijñānaṃ bahuputratāyai vidadhat siddhavat pratyayāvṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:41: atra āha - bhavatu nāma sādhyaphaleṣu pratyayeṣu āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:43: yaḥ tu parabrahmaviṣayaḥ pratyayo nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvameva ātmabhūtaṃ paraṃ brahma samarpayati tatra kim arthāvṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:44: sakṛt śrutau ca brahma ātmatvapratīti anupapatteḥ āvṛtti abhyupagama iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:47: iti evañjātīyakaṃ vākyaṃ sakṛt śrūyamāṇaṃ brahmātmatva pratītiṃ na utpādayet tataḥ tadeva āvartyamānam utpādayiṣyati iti kā pratyāśā syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:48: atha ucyeta na kevalaṃ vākyaṃ kañcidarthaṃ sākṣātkartuṃ śaknoti ato yuktyapekṣaṃ vākyam anubhāvayiṣyati brahmātmatvam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:50: sā api hi yuktiḥ sakṛt pravṛttaiva svam artham anubhāvayiṣyati /
GSP33brssbh4u:51: athāpi syāt uktyā vākyena ca sāmānyaviṣayameva vijñānaṃ kriyate na viśeṣaviṣayam /
GSP33brssbh4u:52: yathā asti me hṛdaye śūlam ityato vākyāt gātra kampādi liṅgāt ca śūlasadbhāva sāmānyameva paraḥ pratipadyate na viśeṣam anubhavati yathā sa eva śūlī /
GSP33brssbh4u:53: viśeṣa anubhavaḥ ca avidyāyā nivartakaḥ tataḥ tadartha āvṛttiḥ iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:54: asakṛt api tāvat mātre kriyamāṇe viśeṣavijñāna utpatti asaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:55: na hi sakṛt prayuktābhyāṃ śāstrayuktibhyām anavagato viśeṣaḥ śatakṛtvaḥ api prayujyamānābhyām avagantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:56: tasmāt yadi śāstrayuktibhyāṃ viśeṣaḥ pratipādyate yadi vā sāmānyameva ubhayathā api sakṛt pravṛtte eva te svakāryaṃ kuruta iti āvṛtti anupayogaḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:57: na ca sakṛt prayukte śāstrayuktī kasyacit api anubhavaṃ na utpādayata iti śakyate niyantuṃ vicitraprajñatvāt pratipattṛṇām /
GSP33brssbh4u:58: api ca aneka aṃśopete laukike padārthe sāmānya viśeṣavat ekena avadhānena ekam aṃśam avadhārayati apareṇa aparam iti syāt api abhyāsa upayogo yathā dīrghaprapāṭhakagrahaṇādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:59: na tu nirviśeṣe brahmaṇi sāmānya viśeṣarahite caitanyamātrātmake pramā utpattau abhyāsāpekṣā yukta iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:60: atra ucyate - bhavet āvṛtti ānarthakyaṃ taṃ prati yaḥ tattvamasi iti sakṛt uktameva brahmātmatvam anubhavituṃ śaknuyāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:61: yastu na śaknoti taṃ pratyupayujyata eva āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:65: ādāśaṅkā kāraṇaṃ nirākṛtya tattvamasi iti eva asakṛt upadiśate /
GSP33brssbh4u:68: nanu uktaṃ sakṛt śrutaṃ cet tattvamasi vākyaṃ svam artham anubhāvayituṃ na śaknoti tata āvartyamānam api na eva śakṣyati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:71: dṛśyante hi sakṛt śrutāt vākyāt mandapratītaṃ vākyārtham āvartayantaḥ tat tat ābhāsavyudāsena samyak pratipadyamānāḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:72: api ca tattvamasi iti etat vākyaṃ tvaṃ padārthasya tat padārthabhāvam ācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssbh4u:73: tat padena ca prakṛtaṃ sat brahma īkṣitṛ jagato janmādikāraṇam abhidhīyate 'satyaṃ jñānamananta brahma' (tai. 2.1.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:83: anubhāvātmako brahmasaṃjñakaḥ tat padārtho vedānta abhiyuktānāṃ prasiddhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:84: tathā tvaṃpadārthaḥ api pratyagātmā śrotā dehāt ārabhya pratyagātmatayā saṃbhāvyamānaḥ caitanyaparyantatvena avadhāritaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:85: tatra yeṣām etau padārthau ajñāna saṃśaya viparyaya pratibaddhau teṣāṃ tatvamasi
GSP33brssbh4u:86: ityetat vākyaṃ svārthe pramāṃ na utpādayituṃ śaknoti padārthajñānapūrvakatvāt vākyārthasya
GSP33brssbh4u:88: yadyapi ca pratipattavya ātmā niraṃśaḥ tathā api adhyāropitaṃ tasmin bahu aśatvaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:89: deha indriya mano buddhi viṣaya vedanādi lakṣaṇaṃ tatra ekena avadhānena ekam aṃśam
GSP33brssbh4u:90: apohati apareṇa aparam iti yujyate tatra kramavatī pratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:92: yeṣāṃ punaḥ nipuṇamatīnāṃ na ajñānasaṃśayaviparyayalakṣaṇaḥ padārthaviṣayaḥ pratibandhaḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:93: asti te śaknuvanti sakṛt uktameva tattvamasi vākyārtham anubhavitum iti tān pratyāvṛtti
GSP33brssbh4u:95: sakṛt utpanna eva hi ātmapratipattiḥ avidyāṃ nivartayati iti na atra kaścit api kramaḥ abhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:96: satyamevaṃ yujyeta yadi kasyacit evaṃ pratipattiḥ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh4u:98: ato na duḥkhitvādi abhāvaṃ kaścit pratipadyata iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:99: dehādi abhimānavat duḥkhitvādi abhimānasya mithyā abhimānatva upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:100: pratyakṣaṃ hi dehe chidyamāne dahyamāne vā ahaṃ chidye dahya iti ca mithyā abhimāno dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:101: tathā bāhyatareṣu api putramitrādiṣu saṃtapyamāneṣu ahameva saṃtapya ityadi āropo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:103: dehādivat eva caitanyāt bahiḥ upalabhamānatvāt duḥkhitvādīnāṃ suṣuptādiṣu ca ananuvṛtteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:104: caitanyasya tu suṣupte api anuvṛttim āmananti 'yadvai tanna paśyati paśyanvai tanna paśyati' (bṛ. 4.3.23) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh4u:105: tasmāt sarvaduḥkhavinirmukta ekacaitanyātmakaḥ aham ityeṣa ātmānubhavaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:106: na ca evam ātmānam anubhavataḥ kiñcit anyat kṛtyam avaśiṣyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:107: tathā ca śrutiḥ - 'kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yamātmāyaṃ lokaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssbh4u:110: ātmanyeva ca saṃtuṣṭasya kāryaṃ na vidyate' (gī. 3.17) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:111: yasya tu na eṣaḥ anubhavo drāgiva jāyate taṃ pratyanubhavārtha eva āvṛtti abhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:112: tatra api na tattvamasi vākyārthāt pracyāvyāvṛttau pravartayet /
GSP33brssbh4u:114: niyuktasya ca asmin adhikṛtaḥ ahaṃ kartā mayā idaṃ mandam apratibhānāt taṃ brahmapratyayāt viparītapratyaya utpadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:115: yaḥ tu svayameva mandamatiḥ apratibhānāt taṃ vākyārthaṃ jihāset tasya etasmin eva vākyārthe sthirīkāra āvṛttyādi vāco yuktyā abhyupeyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:116: tasmāt parabrahmaviṣaye api pratyaye tat upāya upadeśeṣu āvṛttisiddhiḥ // 2 //
GSP33brssbh4u:119: yaḥ śāstroktaviśeṣaṇa paramātmā sa kim aham iti grahītavyaḥ kiṃvā mat anya iti etat vicārayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:120: kathaṃ punaḥ ātmaśabde pratyagātmaviṣaye śrūyamāṇe saṃśaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:121: ucyate - ayam ātmaśabdo mukhyaḥ śakyate abhyupagantuṃ sati jīva īśvarayoḥ abhedasaṃbhava itarathā tu gauṇaḥ ayam abhyupagantavya iti manyate
GSP33brssbh4u:122: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ na aham iti grāhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:123: na hi apahatapāpmatvādi guṇo viparīta guṇatvena śakyate grahītuṃ viparīta guṇo ca apahatapāpmatvādi guṇatvena /
GSP33brssbh4u:124: apahatapāpmatvādi guṇaḥ ca parameśvaraḥ tadviparītaguṇaḥ tu śārīraḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:125: īśvarasya ca saṃsāri ātmatva īśvara abhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:127: saṃsāriṇaḥ api īśvara ātmatve adhikāri abhāvāt śāstra ānarthakyameva,
GSP33brssbh4u:129: anyatve api tādātmya darśanaṃ śāstrāt kartavyaṃ pratimādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādidarśanam iti cet kāmamevaṃ bhavatu /
GSP33brssbh4u:130: na tu saṃsāriṇo mukhya ātma īśvara ityetat naḥ prāpayitavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:131: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ātma ityeva parameśvaraḥ pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:132: tathā hi parameśvara prakriyāyāṃ jābālā ātmatvena eva etam upagacchanti - 'tvaṃ vā ahamasmi bhagavo devato 'haṃ vai tvamasi bhagavo deveti' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:133: tathā anye api 'ahaṃ brahmāsmi' ityevam ādaya ātmatva upagamā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:134: grāhayanti ca ātmatvena eva īśvaraṃ vedāntavākyāni 'eṣa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ' (bṛ. 3.4.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:138: yat uktaṃ pratīka darśanam idaṃ viṣṇupratimā nyāyena bhaviṣyati iti tat ayuktaṃ gauṇatva prasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:140: yatra hi pratīkadṛṣṭiḥ abhipreyate sakṛdeva tatra vacanaṃ bhavati yathā - 'mano brahma' (chā. 3.18.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:142: iha punaḥ tvam aham asmi ahaṃ ca tvam asi iti āha,
GSP33brssbh4u:145: tathā hi - 'atha yo 'nyāṃ devatāmupāste 'nyo 'sāvanyo 'hamīti na sa veda' (bṛ. 1.4.10)
GSP33brssbh4u:146: 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.5.7)
GSP33brssbh4u:147: iti evamādyā bhūyasī śrutiḥ bhedadarśanam apavadati /
GSP33brssbh4u:148: yat tu uktaṃ na viruddhaguṇayoḥ anyonya ātmasaṃbhava iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:154: na hi īśvarasya saṃsāri ātmatvaṃ pratipādyata iti abhyupagacchāmaḥ kiṃ tarhi saṃsāriṇaḥ saṃsāritva apohena īśvarātmatvaṃ pratipipāyiṣitam iti
GSP33brssbh4u:155: evaṃ ca sati advaita īśvarasya apahatapāpmatvādiguṇatā viparītaguṇatā tu itarasya mithyā iti vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:156: yat api uktam adhikāri abhāvaḥ pratyakṣādivirodhaḥ ca iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:161: ityādinā hi prabodhe pratyakṣādi abhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:162: pratyakṣādi abhāve śruteḥ api abhāvaprasaṅga iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:166: iti vacanāt iṣyata eva asmābhiḥ śruteḥ api abhāvaḥ prabodhe /
GSP33brssbh4u:167: kasya punaḥ ayam aprabodha iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:168: ya- tvaṃ pṛcchasi tasya ta iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:169: nanu aham īśvara eva uktaḥ śrutyā,
GSP33brssbh4u:170: yadi evaṃ pratibuddhaḥ asi na asti kasyacit aprabodhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:171: yaḥ api doṣaḥ codyate kaiścit avidyā kila ātmanaḥ sadvitīyatvāt advaita anupapattiḥ iti saḥ api etena pratyuktaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:172: tasmāt ātma iti eva īśvare mano dadhīta // 3 //
GSP33brssbh4u:174: na pratīke na hi saḥ / BBs_4,1.4 /
GSP33brssbh4u:178: iti evamādiṣu pratīka upāsaneṣu saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ teṣu api ātmagrahaḥ kartavyo na vā iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:182: brahmaṇaḥ śrutiṣu ātmatvena prasiddhatvāt pratīkānām api brahmavikāratvāt brahmatve satyām ātmatva upapatteḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:183: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na pratīkeṣu ātma matiṃ badhnīyāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:184: na hi sa upāsakaḥ pratīkāni vyastāni ātmatvenākalayet /
GSP33brssbh4u:185: yat punaḥ brahmavikāratvāt pratīkānāṃ brahmatvaṃ tataḥ ca ātmatvam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:188: vikārasvarūpa upamardena hi nāmādi jātasya brahmatvameva āśrite bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:189: svarūpa upamarde ca nāmādīnāṃ kutaḥ pratīkatvam ātmagraho vā /
GSP33brssbh4u:190: na ca brahmaṇa ātmatvāt brahmadṛṣṭi upadeśeṣu ātmadṛṣṭiḥ kalpyā /
GSP33brssbh4u:192: kartṛtvādi saṃvarga saṃsāra dharmanirākaraṇe hi brahmaṇa ātmatva upadeśaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:194: ataḥ ca upāsakasya pratīkaiḥ samatvāt ātmagraho na upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:195: na hi rūcaka svastikayoḥ itaretara ātmatvam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:196: suvarṇa ātmatvena iva tu brahma ātmatvena ekatve pratīka abhāvaprasaṅgam avocāma /
GSP33brssbh4u:200: teṣu eva udāharaṇeṣu anyaḥ saṃśayaḥ - kim ādityādi dṛṣṭayo brahmaṇi adhyasitavyāḥ kiṃvā brahmadṛṣṭiḥ ādityādiṣu iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:202: atra hi brahmaśabdasya ādityādiśabdaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam upalabhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:203: ādityo brahma prāṇo brahma vidyut brahma ityādi samāna vibhakti nirdeśāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:204: na ca atra āñjasaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam avakalpate /
GSP33brssbh4u:206: na hi bhavati gauḥ aśva iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:207: nanu prakṛtivikārabhāvāt brahma ādityānāṃ mṛt śarāvādivat sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:211: paramātma vākyaṃ ca idaṃ tadānīṃ syāt tataḥ ca upāsana adhikāro bādhyeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:213: tasmāt brāhmaṇaḥ agniḥ vaiśvānara ityādivat anyatra anyadṛṣṭi adhyāse sati kva kindṛṣṭiḥ adhyasyatām iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:214: tatra aniyamo niyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasya abhāvāt ityevaṃ prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:215: athavā ādityādi dṛṣṭaya eva brahmaṇi kartavyā iti evaṃ prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:216: evaṃ hi ādityādi dṛṣṭibhiḥ brahma upāsitaṃ bhavati brahma upāsanaṃ ca phalavat iti śāstramaryādā /
GSP33brssbh4u:218: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - brahmadṛṣṭiḥ eva ādityādiṣu syāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:223: tathā ca laukiko nyāyo anugato bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:224: utkṛṣṭadṛṣṭiḥ hi nikṛṣṭe adhyasitavya iti laukiko nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:228: na hi kṣattṛdṛṣṭiparigṛhīto rājā nikarṣaṃ nīyamānaḥ śreyase syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:229: nanu śāstraprāmāṇyāt anāśaṅkanīyaḥ atra pratyavāya prasaṅgo na ca lokikena nyāyena śāstrīyā dṛṣṭiḥ niyantuṃ yukta iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:230: atra ucyate - nirdhārite śāstrārtha etat evaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:231: saṃdigdhe tu tasmin nirṇayaṃ prati lokikaḥ api nyāya āśrīyanāṇo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:232: tena ca utkṛṣṭadṛṣṭi adhyāse śāstrārthe avadhāryamāṇe nikṛṣṭadṛṣṭim adhyasyan pratyaveyāt iti śliṣyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:233: prāthamyāt ca ādityādi śabdānāṃ mukhyārthatvam avirodhāt gṛhītavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:234: taiḥ svārthavṛttibhiḥ avaruddhāyāṃ buddhau paścāt avatarato brahmaśabdasya mukhyayā vṛttyā sāmānādhikaraṇya asaṃbhavāt brahmadṛṣṭividhānārthata eva avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:235: itiparatvāt api brahmaśabdasya eṣa eva artho nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:236: tathā hi 'brahmetyādeśaḥ' 'brahmetyupāsīta' 'brahametyupāste' iti ca sarvatra itiparaṃ brahmaśabdam uccārayati śuddhān tu ādityādi śabdān /
GSP33brssbh4u:237: tata- ca yathā śuktikāṃ rajatam iti pratyeti ityatra śuktivacana eva śuktikā śabdo rajataśabdaḥ tu rajatapratīti lakṣaṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:238: pratyetyeva hi kevalaṃ rajatam iti na tu tatra rajatam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:239: evam atra api ādityādīn brahma iti pratīyāt iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:240: vākyaśeṣaḥ api ca dvitīyānirdeśena ādityādīneva upāstikriyayā vyāpyamānān darśayati - 'sa ya etamevaṃ vidvānādityaṃ brahmetyupāste' (chā. 3.19.4)
GSP33brssbh4u:243: yat tu uktaṃ brahma upāsanām eva atra ādaraṇīyaṃ phalatvāya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:245: uktena nyāyena ādityādīnām eva upāsyatva avagamāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:246: phalaṃ tu atithyādi upāsana iva ādityādi upāsane 'pi brahma eva dāsyati sarva adhyakṣatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:247: varṇitaṃ ca etat 'phalamata upapatteḥ' (bra.sū. 3.2.38) iti atra /
GSP33brssbh4u:248: īdṛśaṃ ca atra brahmaṇa upāsyatvaṃ yat pratīkeṣu tat dṛṣṭi adhyāropaṇaṃ pratimādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādīnām // 5 //
GSP33brssbh4u:255: iti evamādiṣu aṅgāvabaddheṣu upāsaneṣu saṃśayaḥ kim ādityādiṣu udgīthādi dṛṣṭayo vidhīyante kiṃ vā udgīthādiṣu eva ādityādi dṛṣṭaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:256: tatra aniyamo niyamakāraṇa abhāvāt iti prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:257: na hi atra brahmaṇa iva kasyacit utkarṣaviśeṣaḥ avadhāryate 'brahma hi samasta jagat
GSP33brssbh4u:258: kāraṇatvāt apahatapāpmatvādi guṇayogāt ca ādityādibhya utkṛṣṭam iti śakyam avadhārayituṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:259: na tu āditya udgīthādīnāṃ vikāratva aviśeṣāt kañcit utkarṣaviśeṣa avadhāraṇe kāraṇam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:263: udgīthādimatibhiḥ upāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmātmakāḥ santaḥ phalahetavo bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:266: iti ṛkśabdena pṛthivīṃ nirdiśati sāmaśabdena agniṃ tat ca pṛthivi agnyoḥ rṛk sāmadṛṣṭicīkīrṣāyām avakalpate na ṛk sāmayoḥ pṛthivi agnidṛṣṭi cikīrṣāyām /
GSP33brssbh4u:267: kṣattari hi rājadṛṣṭikaraṇāt rājaśabda upacaryate na rājani kṣattṛśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:269: iti adhikaraṇanirdeśāt lokeṣu sāma adhyasitavyam iti pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:272: prathamanirdiṣṭeṣu ca ādityādiṣu caramanirdiṣṭaṃ brahma adhyastam 'ādityo brahmetyādeśaḥ' (chā. 3.19.1) ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:273: prathamanirdiṣṭāḥ ca pṛthivyādayaḥ caramanardiṣṭā hiṅkārādayaḥ 'pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ' (chā. 2.2.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:276: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ādityādimataya eva aṅgeṣu udgīthādiṣu kṣipyeran /
GSP33brssbh4u:278: upapadyate hi evam apūrvasaṃnikarṣāt ādityādimatibhiḥ saṃskriyamāṇeṣu udgīthādiṣu karmasamṛddhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:279: 'yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.10)
GSP33brssbh4u:282: svatantraphaleṣu tu katham 'ya etadevaṃ vidvāṃllokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste' (chā. 2.2.3) ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:283: teṣu api adhikṛta adhikārāt prakṛta apūrvasaṃnikarṣeṇa eva phalakalpanā yuktā godohanādīniyamavat /
GSP33brssbh4u:284: phalātmakatvāt ca ādityādīnām udgīthādibhyaḥ karmātmakebhya utkarṣa upapattiḥ ādityādiprāptilakṣaṇaṃ hi karmaphalaṃ śiṣyate śrutiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:287: iti ca udgīthameva upāsyatvena upakramya ādityādimatīḥ vidadhāti /
GSP33brssbh4u:288: yat tu uktam udgīthādimatibhiḥ upāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmabhūyaṃ bhūtvā phalaṃ kariṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:291: ādityādibhāvena api ca dṛśyamānānām udgīthādīnāṃ karmātmakatvān apāyāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:293: iti tu lākṣaṇika eva pṛthivī agnyoḥ ṛk sāmaśabdaprayogaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:294: lakṣaṇā ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭena viprakṛṣṭena vā svārthasaṃbandhena pravartate /
GSP33brssbh4u:295: tatra yadi api ṛk sāmayoḥ pṛthivī agnyoḥ ca saṃnidhānayoreva eṣa ṛk sāmaśabdaprayoga ṛk sāmasaṃbandhāt iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:296: kṣattṛśabdaḥapi hi kutaścit kāraṇāt rājānam upasarpan na nivārayituṃ pāryate /
GSP33brssbh4u:298: iti ca yathā akṣaranyāsam ṛca eva pṛthivītvam avadhārayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:299: pṛthivyā hi aktve avadhāryamāṇa iyam ṛk eva ityakṣaranyāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:301: iti ca aṅgāśrayameva vijñānam upasaṃharati na pṛthivyādi āśrayam /
GSP33brssbh4u:303: iti yadi api saptamīnirdiṣṭā lokāḥ tathāpi sāmnyeva te adhyasyeran dvitīyānirdeśena sāmna upāsyatva avagamāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:304: sāmani hi lokeṣu adhyasyamāneṣu sāma lokātmana upāsitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:305: anyathā punaḥ lokāḥ sāmā ātmana upāsitāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:308: yatra api tulyo dvitīyanirdeśaḥ - 'atha khalvamumādityaṃ saptavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta' (chā. 2.9.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:309: iti, tatra api 'samastasya khalu sāmna upāsanaṃ sādhu' (chā. 2.8.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:312: iti ca sāmna eva upāsyatva upakramāt tasmin eva ādityādi adhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:313: etasmāt eva ca sāmna upāsyatva avagamāt 'pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ' (chā. 2.2.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:314: ityādinirdeśaviparyaye api hiṅkārādiṣu eva pṛthivyādi dṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:315: tasmāt anaṅgāśrayā ādityādimatayaḥ aṅgeṣu udgīthādiṣu kṣipyeran iti siddham // 6 //
GSP33brssbh4u:318: karmāṅgasaṃbaddheṣu tāvat upāsaneṣu karmatantratvāt na āsanādicintā na api samyak darśane vastutantratvāt vijñānasya /
GSP33brssbh4u:319: itareṣu tu upāsaneṣu kim aniyamena tiṣṭhan āsīnaḥ śayāno vā pravarteta uta niyamena āsīna eva iti cintayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:320: tatra mānasatvāt upāsanasya aniyamaḥ śarīrasthiteḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:321: evaṃ prāpte bravīti - āsīna eva upāsīta iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:323: upāsanaṃ nāma samānapratyayapravāhakaraṇaṃ na ca tat gacchato dhāvato vā saṃbhavati gatyādīnāṃ cittavikṣepakatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:324: tiṣṭhataḥ api dehadhāraṇe vyāpṛtaṃ mano na sūkṣmavastunirīkṣaṇakṣamaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:325: śayānasya api akasmāt eva nidrayā abhibhūyeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:326: āsīnasya tu evañjātīyako bhūyān doṣaḥ suparihara iti saṃbhavati tasya upāsanam // 7 //
GSP33brssbh4u:328: api ca dhyāyati arthaṃ eṣa yat samānapratyayapravāhakaraṇam /
GSP33brssbh4u:329: dhyāyatiḥ ca praśithila aṅgaceṣṭeṣu pratiṣṭhitadṛṣṭiṣu ekaviṣaya ākṣiptacitteṣu upacaryamāṇo dṛśyate dhyāyati bako dhyāyati proṣitabandhuḥ iti
GSP33brssbh4u:334: iti atra pṛthivyādiṣu acalatvameva apekṣya dhyāyativādo bhavati tat ca liṅgam upāsanasya āsīnakarmatve // 9 //
GSP33brssbh4u:336: smaranti api ca śiṣṭā upāsana aṅgatvena āsanam - 'śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiramāsanamātmanaḥ' (gī. 6.11) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh4u:337: ata eva padmakādīnām āsanaviśeṣāṇām upadeśo yogaśāstre // 10 //
GSP33brssbh4u:340: dik deśakāleṣu saṃśayaḥ - kim asti kaścit niyamo na asti vā iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:341: prāyeṇa vaidikeṣu ārambheṣu digādiniyamadarśanāt syāt iha api kaścit niyama iti yasya matiḥ taṃ prati āha dik deśakāleṣu arthalakṣaṇa eva niyamaḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:342: yatra eva asya diśi deśe kāle vā manasaḥ sokaryeṇa ekāgratā bhavati tatra eva upāsīta prācīdik pūrvāhna prācīna pravaṇādivat viśeṣa aśrāvaṇāt
GSP33brssbh4u:344: nanu viśeṣam api kecit āmananti - 'same śucau kharkarāvahnivālukāvivarjite śabdajalāśrayādibhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:348: sati tu etasmin tadgateṣu viśeṣaniyama iti suhṛt bhūtvā ācārya ācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssbh4u:349: 'manonukūle' iti ca eṣā śrutiḥ yatra ekāgratā tatra eva iti etat eva darśayati // 11 //
GSP33brssbh4u:351: ā prayāṇāt tatrāpi hi dṛṣṭam / BBs_4,1.12 /
GSP33brssbh4u:352: āvṛttiḥ sarva upāsaneṣu ādartavya iti sthitam ādye adhikaraṇe /
GSP33brssbh4u:353: tatra yāni tāvat samyak darśanārthāni upāsanāni tāni avaghātādivat kāryaparyavasānāni iti jñātameva eṣām āvṛttiparimāṇam /
GSP33brssbh4u:354: na hi samyak darśane kārye niṣpanne yatnāntaraṃ kiñcit śāsituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:356: yāni punaḥ abhyudayaphalāni teṣu eṣā cintā kiṃ kiyantañcit kālaṃ pratyayam āvartya uparamet uta yāvajjīvam āvartayet iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:358: kiyantañcit kālaṃ pratyayam abhyasya utsṛjet āvṛttiviśiṣṭasya upāsanaśabdārthasya kṛtatvāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:359: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - āprāyaṇāt eva āvartayet pratyayam /
GSP33brssbh4u:361: karmāṇi api hi janmāntara upabhogyaṃ phalam ārabhamāṇāni tat anurūpaṃ bhāvanāvijñānaṃ prāyaṇakāla ākṣipanti,
GSP33brssbh4u:363: prāṇastejasā yuktaḥ sahātmanā yathāsaṃkalpitaṃ lokaṃ nayati' iti ca evamādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:365: pratyayāḥ tu ete svarūpa anuvṛttiṃ muktvā kim anyat prāyaṇakālabhāvi bhāvanāvijñānam apekṣeran /
GSP33brssbh4u:366: tasmāt ye pratipattavyaphalabhāvanātmakāḥ pratyayaḥ teṣu aprāyaṇāt āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:367: tathā ca śrutiḥ -'sa yāvatkraturayamasmāllokātpraiti' iti prāyaṇakāle api pratyaya anuvṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:368: smṛtiḥ api - 'yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaranbhāvaṃ tyajatyante kalevaram /
GSP33brssbh4u:371: 'so 'ntavelāyāmetattrayaṃ pratipadyeta' iti ca maraṇavelāyām api kartavyaśeṣaṃ śrāvayati // 12 //
GSP33brssbh4u:375: atha idānīṃ brahmavidyāphalaṃ prati cintā pratāyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:376: brahma adhigame sati tat viparītaphalaṃ duritaṃ kṣīyate na kṣīyate vā iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:378: phalārthatvāt karmaṇaḥ phalam adatvā na saṃbhāvyate kṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:379: phaladāyinī hi asya śaktiḥ śrutyā samadhigatā /
GSP33brssbh4u:380: yadi tadantareṇa eva phala upabhogam apavṛjyeta śrutiḥ kadarthitā syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:382: nanu evaṃ sati prāyaścitta upadeśaḥanarthakaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh4u:385: api ca prāyaścittānāṃ doṣasaṃyogena vidānāt bhavet api doṣakṣapaṇārthatā na tu evaṃ brahmavidyāyāṃ vidhānam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:386: nanu anabhyupagamyamāne brahmavidaḥ karmakṣaye tatphalasya avaśyaṃ bhoktavyatāvāt anirmokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:389: tasmāt na brahma adhigame duritanivṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:390: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- tat adhigame brahma adhigame sati uttarapūrvayoḥ aghayoḥ aśleṣavināśau bhavataḥ uttarasya aśleṣaḥ pūrvasya vināśaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:393: tathā hi brahmavidyā prakriyāyāṃ saṃbhāvyamānasaṃbandhasya āgāmino duritasya anabhisaṃbandhaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:394: viduṣo vyapadiśati - 'yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma
GSP33brssbh4u:396: tathā vināśam api pūrva ucitasya duritasya vyapadiśati - 'tadyatheṣīkātūlamagnau protaṃ pradūyetaivaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante' (chā. 5.24.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:397: ayam aparaḥ karmakṣayavyapadeśo bhavati - 'bhidyate hṛdayagranthiśchidyante sarvasaṃśayāḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:398: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (mu. 2.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:399: yat uktam anupabhuktaphalasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayakalpanāyāṃ śāstraṃ kadarthitaṃ syāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:401: na hi vayaṃ karmaṇaḥ phaladāyinīṃ śaktim avajānīmahe,
GSP33brssbh4u:403: sā tu vidyādinā kāraṇāntareṇa pratibadhyata iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:404: śaktisadbhāvamātre ca śāstraṃ vyāpriyate na pratibandha apratibandhayoḥ api /
GSP33brssbh4u:405: na hi karma kṣīyata iti etat api smaraṇam autsargikaṃ na bhogāt ṛte karma kṣīyata tadarthatvāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:406: iṣyata eva tu prāyaścittādinā tasya kṣayaḥ 'sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ tarati' 'tarati brahmahatyāṃ yo 'śvamedhena yajate ya u cainameva vada' ityādi śrutismṛtibhyaḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:407: yat tu uktaṃ naimittikāni prāyaścittāni bhaviṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:409: doṣasaṃyogena codyamānānām eṣāṃ doṣanirghātaphalasaṃbhave phalāntarakalpanā anupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:410: yatpunaḥ etat uktaṃ na prāyaścittavat doṣakṣaya uddeśena vidyāvidānam asti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:411: atra brūmaḥ - saguṇāsu tāvat vidyāsu vidyata eva vidhānam /
GSP33brssbh4u:412: tāsu ca vākyaśeṣa aiśvaryaprāptiḥ pāpanivṛttiḥ ca vidyāvata ucyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:413: tayoḥ ca avivakṣākāraṇaṃ na asti iti ataḥ pāpmaprahāṇapūrvaka aiśvaryaprāptiḥ tāsāṃ phalam iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:414: nirguṇāyāṃ tu vidyāyāṃ yadi api vidhānaṃ na asti tathā api akartṛ ātmatvabodhāt karmapradāhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:415: aśleṣa iti ca āgāmiṣu karmasu kartṛtvameva na pratipadyate brahmavit iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:416: atikrānteṣu tu yadi api mithyājñānāt kartṛtvaṃ pratipeda iva tathā api vidyāsāmarthyāt mithyājñānanivṛtteḥ tāni api pravilīyanta iti āha vināśa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:417: pūrvasiddhakartṛtva bhoktṛtva viparītaṃ hi triṣu api kāleṣu akartṛtva abhoktṛtvasvarūpaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:418: brahma aham asmi na itaḥ pūrvam api kartā bhoktā vā aham āsaṃ na idānīṃ na api bhaviṣyatkāla
GSP33brssbh4u:421: anyathā hi anādikālapravṛttānāṃ karmāṇāṃ kṣayābhāve mokṣa abhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:422: na ca deśakālanimittāpekṣo mokṣaḥ karmaphalavat bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:425: tasmāt brahma adhigame duritakṣaya iti sthiram // 13 //
GSP33brssbh4u:427: itarasyāpy evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu / BBs_4,1.14 /
GSP33brssbh4u:428: pūrvasmin adhikaraṇe bandhahetoḥ aghasya svābhāvikasya aśleṣavināśau jñānanimittau śāstravyapadeśāt nirūpitau /
GSP33brssbh4u:429: dharmasya punaḥ śāstrīyatvāt śāstrīyeṇa jñānena avirodha iti āśaṅkya tat nirākaraṇāya pūrva adhikaraṇanyāya atideśaḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:430: itarasya api puṇyasya karmaṇa evam aghavat asaṃśleṣo vināśaḥ ca jñānavato bhavataḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:433: ityādiśrutiṣu ca duṣkṛtavat sukṛtasya api praṇāśavyapadeśāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:434: akartṛ ātmatvabodhanimittasya ca karmakṣayasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ tulyatvāt 'kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi' (mu. 2.2.8)
GSP33brssbh4u:436: yatra api kevala eva pāpmaśabdo dṛśyate tatra api tena eva puṇyam api akalitam iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:438: asti ca śrutau puṇye api pāpmaśabdaḥ 'nainaṃ setumahorātre tarataḥ' (chā. 8.4.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:439: iti atra saha duṣkṛtena sakṛtamapi anukramya sarve pāpmānaḥ ato nivartanta iti aviśeṣeṇa eva prakṛte puṇye pāpmaśabdaprayogāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:440: pāte tu iti tu śabdaḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:441: evaṃ dharma adharmayoḥ bandhahetvoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt aśleṣavināśasiddheḥ avaśyaṃbhāvinī viduṣaḥ śarīrapāte muktiḥ iti avadhārayati // 14//
GSP33brssbh4u:443: anārabdhakārye eva tu pūrve tadavadheḥ / BBs_4,1.15 /
GSP33brssbh4u:444: pūrvayoḥ adhikaraṇayoḥ jñānanimittaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ vināśaḥ avadhāritaḥ sa kim
GSP33brssbh4u:445: aviśeṣeṇa ārabdhakāryayoḥ anārabdhakāryayoḥ ca bhavati uta viśeṣeṇa anārabdhakāryayoḥ eva iti vicāryate /
GSP33brssbh4u:447: iti evamādiśrutiṣu aviśeṣaśravaṇāt aviśeṣeṇa eva kṣaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:448: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - anārabdhakārye eva tu iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:449: apravṛttaphale eva pūrve janmāntarasaṃcite asmin api ca janmani prāk jñāna utpatteḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:450: saṃcite sukṛtaduṣkṛte jñāna adhigamāt kṣīyete na tu ārabdhakārye sāmibhuktaphale
GSP33brssbh4u:451: yābhyām etat brahmajñāna āyatanaṃ janma nirmitam /
GSP33brssbh4u:452: kuta etat - 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chā. 6.14.2)
GSP33brssbh4u:454: itarathā hi jñānāt aśeṣakarmakṣaye sati sthitihetu abhāvāt jñānaprāpti anantarameva kṣemamśnu avīta,
GSP33brssbh4u:456: nanu vastubalena eva ayam akartṛ ātmāvabodhaḥ karmāṇi kṣapayan kathaṃ kānicit kṣapayet kānicit ca upekṣeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:457: na hi samāne agnibījasaṃparke keṣāñcit bījaśaktiḥ kṣīyate keṣāñcit na kṣīyata iti śakyam aṅgīkartum iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:458: ucyate - na tāvat anāśritya ārabdhakāryaṃ karmāśayaṃ jñāna utpattiḥ upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:459: āśrite ca tasmin kulālacakravat pravṛttavegasya antarāle pratibandha asaṃbhavāt bhavati vegakṣayapratipālanam /
GSP33brssbh4u:460: akartṛ ātmabodhaḥ api hi mithyājñānabādhanena karmāṇi ucchinatti /
GSP33brssbh4u:461: bādhitam api tu mithyājñānaṃ dvicandrajñānavat saṃskāravaśāt kañcitkālam anuvartata eva /
GSP33brssbh4u:462: api ca na eva atra vivaditavyaṃ brahmavidā kañcitkālaṃ śarīraṃ dhriyate na vā dhriyata iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:463: kathaṃ hi ekasya svahṛdayapratyayaṃ brahmavedanaṃ dehadhāraṇaṃ ca apareṇa pratikṣeptuṃ śakyeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:465: tasmāt anārabdhakāryayoḥ eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt kṣaya iti nirṇayaḥ // 15 //
GSP33brssbh4u:468: puṇyasya api aśleṣavināśayoḥ aghanyāyaḥ atidiṣṭaḥ saḥ atideśaḥ sarvapuṇyaviṣaya iti āśaṅkya prativakti - agnihotrādi tu iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:470: yat nityaṃ karma vaidikam agnihotrādi tat tat kāryāya eva bhavati,
GSP33brssbh4u:471: jñānasya yatkāryaṃ tadeva asya api kāryam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:472: kutaḥ - 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssbh4u:474: nanu jñānakarmaṇoḥ vilakṣaṇakāryatvāt kārya ekatva anupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:477: tadvat karmaṇaḥ api jñānasaṃyuktasya mokṣakārya upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:478: nanu anārabhyo mokṣaḥ katham asya karmakāryatvam ucyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:481: jñānasya eva hi prāpakaṃ satkarma prāṇāḍyā mokṣakāraṇam iti upacaryate /
GSP33brssbh4u:482: ata eva ca atikrāntaviṣayam etat kārya ekatva abhidhānam /
GSP33brssbh4u:483: na hi brahmavida āgāmi agnihotrādi saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:485: saguṇāsu tu vidyāsu kartṛtva anativṛtteḥ saṃbhavati āgāmi api agnihotrādi /
GSP33brssbh4u:486: tasya api nirabhisaṃdhinaḥ kāryāntara abhāvāt vidyāsaṃgati upapattiḥ // 16 //
GSP33brssbh4u:487: kiṃviṣayaṃ punaḥ idam aśleṣavināśa vacanaṃ kiṃviṣayaṃ vā ado viniyogavacanam ekeṣāṃ śākhinām 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:490: ataḥ agnihotrādeḥ nityātkarmaṇaḥ anyāpi hi asti sādhukṛtyā yā phalam abhisaṃdhāya kriyate tasyā eṣa viniyoga ukta ekeṣāṃ śākhinām 'suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāmupayanti' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:491: tasyā eva ca idam aghavat aśleṣavināśanirūpaṇam itarasya api evam aśleṣa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:492: tathā jātīyakasya kāmyasya karmaṇo vidyāṃ prati anupakārakatve saṃpratipattiḥ ubhayoḥ api jaiminibādarāyaṇayoḥ ācāryayoḥ // 17 //
GSP33brssbh4u:495: samadhigatam etat anantara adhikaraṇe nityam agnihotrādikaṃ karma mumukṣuṇā mokṣaprayojana
GSP33brssbh4u:497: mokṣaprayojanabrahma adhigamanimittatvena brahmavidyayā saha ekakāryaṃ bhavati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:498: tatra agnihotrādi karmāṅgavyapāśrayavidyāsaṃyuktaṃ kevalaṃ ca asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:499: 'ya evaṃ vidvānayajati' 'ya evaṃ vidvāñjuhoti' 'ya evaṃ vidvāñchaṃsati' 'ya evaṃ vidvāngāyati' 'tasmādevaṃvidameva brahmāṇaṃ kurviti nānevaṃ vidaṃ' (chā. 4.17.10)
GSP33brssbh4u:500: 'tenobhau kuruto yaścaitadevaṃ veda yaśca na veda' (chā. 1.1.10)
GSP33brssbh4u:501: ityādivacanebhyo vidyāsaṃyuktam asti kevalam api asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:502: tatra idaṃ vicāryate - kiṃ vidyāsaṃyuktameva agnihotrādikaṃ karma mumukṣoḥ vidyāhetutvena
GSP33brssbh4u:503: tayā saha ekakāryatvaṃ pratipadyate na kevalam uta vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ kevalaṃ ca aviśeṣeṇa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:504: kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ - 'tametamātmānaṃ yajñena vividiṣanti' iti yajñādīnāmvi aśeṣeṇa ātmavedanāṅgatvena śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:506: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ vidyāsaṃyuktam eva karmāgnihotrādi ātmavidyāśeṣatvaṃ pratipadyate na vidyāhīnam /
GSP33brssbh4u:512: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate - yadeva vidyayā iti hi /
GSP33brssbh4u:514: vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ karmāgnihotrādikaṃ vidyāvihīnāt karmaṇaḥ agnihotrāt viśiṣṭaṃ vidvāniva brāhmaṇo vidyāvihīnāt brāhmaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:515: tathā api na atyantam anapekṣaṃ vidyāvihīnaṃ karmāgnihotrādikam /
GSP33brssbh4u:516: kasmāt - 'tametamātmānaṃ yajñena vividiṣanti' iti aviśeṣeṇa agnihotrādeḥ vidyāhetutvena śrutatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:517: nanu vidyāsaṃyuktasya agnihotrādeḥ vidyāvihīnāt viśiṣṭatva avagamāt vidyāvihīnam agnihotrādi ātmavidyāhetutvena anapekṣameva iti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:519: vidyāsahāyasya agnihotrādeḥ vidyānimittena sāmarthya atiśayena yogāt ātmajñānaṃ prati kaścit kāraṇa atiśayo bhaviṣyati na tathā vidyāvihīnasya iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssbh4u:520: natu 'yajñena vividiṣanti' iti atra aviśeṣeṇa ātmajñānāṅgatvena śrutasya agnihotrādeḥ anaṅgatvaṃ śakyam abhyupagantum /
GSP33brssbh4u:521: tathā hi śrutiḥ - 'yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.10)
GSP33brssbh4u:522: iti vidyāsaṃyuktasya karmaṇaḥ agnihotrādeḥ vīryavattaratva abhidhānena svakāryaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:523: prati kañcit atiśayaṃ bruvāṇā vidyāvihīnasya tasya eva tat prayojanaṃ prati vīryavattvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:524: karmaṇa- ca vīryavattvaṃ tat yat svaprayojanasādhanaprasahatvam /
GSP33brssbh4u:525: tasmāt vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ nityam agnihotrādi vidyāvihīnaṃ ca ubhayam api mumukṣuṇā mokṣaprayojana
GSP33brssbh4u:526: uddeśena iha janmani janmāntare ca prāk jñāna utpatteḥ kṛtaṃ yat tat yathāsāmarthyaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:528: pratipadyamānaṃ śravaṇa manana śraddhā tātparyādi antaraṅgakāraṇāpekṣaṃ brahmavidyayā
GSP33brssbh4u:531: bhogena tv itare kṣapayitvātha saṃpadyate / BBs_4,1.19 /
GSP33brssbh4u:532: anārabdhakāryayoḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt kṣaya uktaḥ itare tu ārabdhakārye
GSP33brssbh4u:533: puṇyapāpe upabhogena kṣapayitvā brahma saṃpadyate 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye
GSP33brssbh4u:536: nanu sati api samyak darśane yathā prāk dehapātāt bhedadarśanaṃ dvicandradarśananyāyena anuvṛttamevaṃ paścāt api anuvarteta / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:538: upabhogaśeṣakṣapaṇaṃ hi tatra anuvṛttinimittaṃ na ca tādṛśamātra kiñcit asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:539: nanu aparaḥ karmāśayoḥ abhinavam upabhogm ārapsyate / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:541: mithyājñāna avaṣṭambhaṃ hi karmāntaraṃ dehapāta upabhogāntaram ārabhate tat ca mithyājñāna
GSP33brssbh4u:542: avaṣṭambhaṃ hi karmāntaraṃ dehapāta upabhogāntaram ārabhate tatca mithyājñānaṃ samyak
GSP33brssbh4u:543: jñānena dagdham ityataḥ sādhu etat ārabdhakāryakṣaye viduṣaḥ kaivalyam avaśyaṃ bhavati iti // 19 //
GSP33brssbh4u:549: atha aparāsu vidyāsu phalaprāptaye devayānaṃ panthānam avatārayiṣyan prathamaṃ tāvat yathāśāstram utkrāntikramam anvācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssbh4u:550: samānā hi vidvat aviduṣoḥ utkrāntiḥ iti vakṣyati /
GSP33brssbh4u:551: asti prāyaṇaviṣayā śrutiḥ 'asya somya puruṣasya prayato vāk manasi saṃpadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇa- tejasi tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyām' (chā. 6.8.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:552: kim iha vāca eva vṛttimattyā manasi saṃpattiḥ ucyata uta vāgvṛtteḥiti viśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:553: tatra vāk eva tāvat manasi saṃpadyata iti prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:556: śrutilakṣaṇa aviśaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā /
GSP33brssbh4u:557: tasmāt vāca eva ayaṃ manasi pralaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:558: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - vāk vṛttiḥ iti vyākhyāte yāvatā vāk menasi iti eva ācāryaḥ paṭhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:560: paṭhiṣyati tu purastāt 'avibhāgo vacanāt' (bra. sū. 4.2.16) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:561: tasmāt atra vṛtti upaśamamātraṃ vivakṣitam iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:562: tattvapralayavivakṣāyāṃ tu sarvatra eva avibhāgasāmyāt kiṃ paratra eva viśiṣyāt avibhāga iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:564: vāk vṛttiḥ pūrvam upasaṃhriyate manovṛttau avasthitāyām iti arthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:567: dṛśyate hi vāk vṛtteḥ pūrva upasaṃhāro manovṛttau vidyamānāyām /
GSP33brssbh4u:568: nanu śrutisāmarthyāt vāca eva ayaṃ manasi apyayo yukta iti uktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:571: yasya hi yata utpattiḥ tasya tatra pralayo nyāyyo mṛdīva śarāvasya /
GSP33brssbh4u:572: na ca manaso vāk utpadyata iti kiñcana pramāṇam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:573: vṛttyutti udbhava abhibhavau tu aprakṛtisamāśrayau api dṛśyete /
GSP33brssbh4u:574: pārthivebhyo hi indhanebhyaḥ taijasasya agneḥ vṛttiḥ udbhavati apsu ca upaśāmyati /
GSP33brssbh4u:575: kathaṃ tarhi asmin pakṣe śabdo vāk manasi saṃpadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:577: śabdaḥ api asmin pakṣe avakalpate vṛttivṛttimatoḥ abheda upacārāt iti arthaḥ // 1 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh4u:582: iti atra aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām eva indriyāṇāṃ manasi saṃpattiḥ śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:583: tatra api ata eva vāca iva cakṣurādīnām api savṛttike manasi avasthite vṛttilopadarśanāt
GSP33brssbh4u:584: tattvapralaya asaṃbhavāt śabda upapatteḥ ca vṛttidvāreṇa eva sarvāṇi indriyāṇi manaḥ anuvartante /
GSP33brssbh4u:585: sarveṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ manasi upasaṃhāra aviśeṣe sati vācaḥ pṛthak grahaṇaṃ vāk manasi saṃpadyata iti udāharaṇa anurodhena // 2 //
GSP33brssbh4u:591: iti kim atra api vṛttisaṃpattiḥ eva vivakṣyata uta vṛttimat saṃpattiḥ iti vicikitsāyāṃ vṛttimat saṃpattiḥ eva atra iti prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:592: śruti anugrahāt tat prakṛtikatva upapatteḥ ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:593: tathā hi - 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥprāṇaḥ' (chā. 6.5.4)
GSP33brssbh4u:594: iti annayoni mana ātmananti ap yoniṃ ca prāṇam /
GSP33brssbh4u:596: ata- ca yat manaḥ prāṇe prakṛtivikāra abhedāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:597: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tat api agṛhīta bāhya indriyavṛtti mano vṛttidvāreṇa eva prāṇe pralīyate iti uttarāt vākyāt avagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:598: tathā hi suṣupso- mumūrṣoḥ ca prāṇavṛttau parispanda ātmikāyām avasthitāyāṃ manovṛttīnām upaśamo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:599: na ca manasaḥ svarūpa apyayaḥ prāṇe saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:603: na hi īdṛśena prāṇāḍikena tat prakṛtitvena manaḥ prāṇe saṃpattum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:604: evam api hi anne manaḥ saṃpadyeta apsu ca annam apsu eva ca prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:605: na hi etasmin api pakṣe prāṇabhāvapariṇatābhyaḥ adbhyo mano jāyata iti kiñcana pramāṇam asti tasmāt na manasaḥ prāṇe svarūpa apyayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:606: vṛtti apyaye api tu śabdaḥ avakalpate vṛttivattimatoḥ abheda upacārāt iti darśitam // 3 //
GSP33brssbh4u:609: sthitam etat yasya yato na utpattiḥ tasya tasmin vṛttipralayo na svarūpapralaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:610: idam idānīṃ prāṇaḥ tejasi iti atra cintyate -
GSP33brssbh4u:611: kiṃ yathāśruti prāṇasya tejasi eva vṛtti upasaṃhāraḥ kiṃvā deha indriyapañjara adhyakṣe jīva iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:612: tatra śruteḥ anatiśaṅkyatvāt prāṇasya tejasi eva saṃpattiḥ syāt aśrutakalpanāyā anyāyyatvāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:613: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate saḥ adhyakṣa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:614: sa prakṛtaḥ prāṇaḥ adhyakṣe avidyākarmapūrvaprajña upādhike vijñāna ātmani avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:615: tat pradhānā prāṇavṛttiḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:617: evam eva imam ātmānam antakāle sarve prāṇā abhisāmayanti yatra etat ūrdhva ucchvāsī bhavati iti hi śrutyantaram adhyakṣa upagāminaḥ sarvān prāṇān aviśeṣeṇa darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:619: iti pañcavṛtteḥ prāṇasya adhyakṣa anugāmitāṃ darśayati tat anuvṛttitāṃ ca itareṣām /
GSP33brssbh4u:621: 'savijñāno bhavati' iti ca adhyakṣasya antarvijñānavattva pradarśanena tasmin apītakaraṇagrāmasya prāṇasya avasthānaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:622: nanu prāṇaḥ tejasi iti śrūyate kathaṃ prāṇaḥ adhyakṣa iti adhikāvāpaḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:624: adhyakṣapradhānatvāt utkramaṇādivyavahārasya śrutyantaragatasya api ca viśeṣasya apekṣaṇīyatvāt // 4 //
GSP33brssbh4u:625: kathaṃ tarhi prāṇaḥ tejasi iti śrutiḥ iti ata āha -
GSP33brssbh4u:627: sa prāṇasaṃpṛktaḥ adhyakṣaḥ tejaḥsahacariteṣu bhūteṣu dehabījabhūteṣu sūkṣmeṣu avatiṣṭhata iti avagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:629: nanu ca iyaṃ śrutiḥ prāṇasya tejasi sthitiṃ darśayati na prāṇasaṃpṛktasya adhyakṣasya /
GSP33brssbh4u:631: saḥ adhyakṣa iti adhyakṣasya api antarāle api upasaṃkhyātatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:632: yaḥ api hi srughnānmathurāṃ gatvā mathurāyāḥ pāṭaliputraṃ vrajati saḥ api srughnātpāṭaliputraṃ yāti iti śakyate vaditum /
GSP33brssbh4u:633: tasmāt prāṇaḥ tejasi iti prāṇasaṃpṛktasya adhyakṣasya eva etat tejaḥ sahacariteṣu bhūteṣu avasthānam // 5 //
GSP33brssbh4u:634: kathaṃ tejaḥsahacariteṣu bhūteṣu iti ucyate yāvat ekameva śrūyate prāṇaḥ tejasi iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:637: na ekasmin eva tejasi śarīrāntaraprepsāvelāyāṃ jīvaḥ avatiṣṭhate kāryasya śarīrasya anekātmakatvadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:638: darśayataḥ ca etam arthaṃ praśnaprativacane 'āpaḥ puruṣavacasaḥ' (chā. 5.3.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:642: smṛtiḥ api 'aṇvyo mātrāvināśinyo daśārdhānāṃ tu yāḥsmṛtāḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:644: nanu ca upasaṃhṛteṣu vāk ādiṣu karaṇeṣu śarīrāntaraprepsāvelāyāṃ 'kvāyaṃ tadā puruṣo bhavati' (bṛ. 3.2.13)
GSP33brssbh4u:645: iti upakramya śrutyantaraṃ karmāśrayatāṃ nirūpayati - 'tau ha yadūcatuḥ karma haiva tadūcaturatha ha yatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ karma haiva tatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.13) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:646: atra ucyate - tatra karmaprayuktasya graha atigrahasaṃjñakastha indriyaviṣayātmakasya bandhanasya pravṛttiḥ iti karmāśrayatā uktā /
GSP33brssbh4u:647: iha punaḥ bhūta upādānāt dehāntara utpattiḥ iti bhūtāśrayatvam uktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:648: praśaṃsāśabdāt api tatra prādhānyamātraṃ karmaṇaḥ pradarśitaṃ na tu āśrayāntaraṃ nivāritam /
GSP33brssbh4u:655: sā iyam utkrāntiḥ kiṃ vidvat aviduṣoḥ samānā kiṃvā viśeṣavati iti viśayānānāṃ viśeṣavati iti tāvat prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:661: nanu vidyāprakaraṇe samāmnānāt viduṣa eva eṣā bhavet / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:663: tathā hi 'yatraitatpuruṣaḥ svapiti nāma' 'aśiśiṣati nāma' 'pipāsati nāma' (chā. 6.8.3,5)
GSP33brssbh4u:664: iti ca sarvaprāṇisādhāraṇā eva svāpādayaḥ anukīrtyante vidyāprakaraṇe api pratipādayiṣitavastupratipādana anuguṇyena na tu viduṣo viśeṣavanto vidhitsyante /
GSP33brssbh4u:665: evam iyam api utkrāntiḥ mahājanagata eva anukīrtyate yasyāṃ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ puruṣasya prayataḥ tejaḥ saṃpadyate sa ātmā tattvamasi iti etat pratipādayitum /
GSP33brssbh4u:666: pratiṣiddhā ca eṣā viduṣaḥ 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:668: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - samānā ca eṣa utkrāntiḥ vāk manasi ityādyā vidvat aviduṣoḥ āsṛti upakramāt bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:670: aviruddhān dehabījabhūtāni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi āśritya karmaprayukto dehagrahaṇam anubhavituṃ saṃsarati /
GSP33brssbh4u:672: tat etat āsṛti upakramāt iti uktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:673: nanu amṛtatvaṃ hi viduṣā prāptavyaṃ na ca tat deśāntara āyattaṃ tatra kṛto bhūta āśrayatvaṃ sṛti upakramo vā iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:675: adagdhvā atyantam avidyādīn kleśān aparavidyāsāmarthyāt āpekṣikam amṛtatvaṃ prepsate saṃbhavati tatra sṛti upakramo bhūta āśrayatvaṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:676: ne hi nirāśrayāṇāṃ prāṇānāṃ gatiḥ upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:681: iti atra prakaraṇasāmarthyāt tat yathāprakṛtaṃ tejaḥ sādhyakṣaṃ saprāṇaṃ sakaraṇagrāmaṃ bhūtāntarasahitaṃ prayataḥ puṃsaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ saṃpadyata iti etat uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:682: kīdṛśī punaḥ iyaṃ saṃpattiḥ syāt iti cintyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:683: tatra ātyantika eva tāvat svarūpapravilaya iti prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:685: sarvasya hi janimato vastujātasya prakṛtiḥ parā devatā iti pratiṣṭhāpitam /
GSP33brssbh4u:687: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tat teja ādi bhūtasūkṣmaṃ śrotrādikaraṇāśrayabhūtamāpīterā saṃsāramokṣāt samyak jñānanimittāt avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:691: anyathā hi sarvaḥ prāyaṇasamaya eva upādhipratyastamayāt atyantaṃ brahma saṃpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:692: tatra vidhiśāstram anarthakaṃ syāt vidyāśāstraṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:693: mithyājñānanimittaḥ ca bandho na samyak jñānāt ṛte visraṃsitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:694: tasmāt tat prakṛtitve api suṣuptapralayavat bījabhāva avaśeṣa eva eṣā saṃtsapattiḥ iti // 8 //
GSP33brssbh4u:696: tat ca itarabhūtasahitaṃ tejo jīvasya asmāt śarīrāt pravasata āśrayabhūtaṃ svarūpataḥ pramāṇataḥ ca sūkṣmaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:697: tathā hi - nāḍīniṣkramaṇaśravaṇādibhyaḥ asya saukṣmyam upalabhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:700: ata eva ca dehāt nirgacchan pārśvasthaiḥ na upalabhyate // 9 //
GSP33brssbh4u:702: ata eva sūkṣmatvāt na asya sthūlasya śarīrasya upamardena dāhādinimittena itarat sūkṣmaṃ śarīram upapadyate // 10 //
GSP33brssbh4u:704: asya eva ca sūkṣmasyā śarīrasya eṣa ūṣmā yam etasmin śarīre saṃsparśena ūṣmāṇaṃ vijānanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:705: tathā hi mṛtāvasthāyām avasthite api dehe vidyamāneṣu api ca rūpādiṣu dehaguṇeṣu
GSP33brssbh4u:706: na ūṣma upalabhyate jīvat avasthāyām eva tu upalabhyata iti ata dehaguṇeṣu na ūṣma
GSP33brssbh4u:707: upalabhyate jīvat avasthāyām eva tu upalabhyata iti ata upapadyate prasiddhaśarīravyatiriktavyapāśraya eva eṣa ūṣma iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:708: tathā ca śrutiḥ - 'uṣṇa eva jīviṣyañśito mariṣyan iti' // 11 //
GSP33brssbh4u:710: pratiṣedhād iti cen na śārīrāt / BBs_4,2.12 /
GSP33brssbh4u:711: 'amṛtatvaṃ cānupoṣya' iti ato viśeṣaṇāt ātyantike amṛtatve gati utkrāntyoḥ abhāvo abhyupagataḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:712: tatra api kenacit kāraṇena utkrāntim āśaṅkya pratiṣedhati - 'athākāmayamāno yo 'kāmo
GSP33brssbh4u:713: niṣkāma āptakāma ātmakāmo bhavati na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti brahmaiva sanbrahmāpyeti' (bṛ. 4.4.6)
GSP33brssbh4u:714: iti ataḥ paravidyāviṣayāt pratiṣedhāt na parabrahmavido dehāt prāṇānām utkrāntiḥ asti iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:716: yataḥ śārīrāt ātmana eṣa utkrāntipratiṣedhaḥ prāṇānāṃ na śarīrāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:717: katham avagamyate 'na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmanti' iti śākhāntare pañcamī prayogāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:718: saṃbandhasāmānyaviṣayā hi ṣaṣṭhī śākhāntaragatayā pañcamyā saṃbandhaviśeṣe vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:719: tasmāt iti ca prādhānyāt abhyudayaniḥśreyasa adhikṛto dehī saṃbadhyate na dehaḥ / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:720: tasmāt uccikramiṣoḥ jīvāt prāṇā apakrāmanti saha eva tena bhavanti iti arthaḥ // 12 //
GSP33brssbh4u:721: saprāṇasya ca pravasato bhavati utkrāntiḥ dehāt iti evaṃ prāpte prati ucyate -
GSP33brssbh4u:723: na tat asti yat uktaṃ parabrahmavidaḥ api dehāt asti utkrāntiḥ utkrāntipratiṣedhasya deha upādānatvāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:724: yato deha upādāna eva utkrāntipratiṣedha ekeṣāṃ samāmnātṛṇāṃ spaṣṭa upalabhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:725: tathā hi - ārtabhāgapraśne 'yatrāyaṃ puruṣo mriyata udasmātprāṇāḥ krāmantyāho neti' (bṛ. 3.2.11)
GSP33brssbh4u:727: iti anutkrāntipakṣaṃ parigṛhya na tarhi ayam anutkrānteṣu prāṇeṣu mriyata iti asyām
GSP33brssbh4u:728: āśaṅkāyām 'atraiva samavanīyanta' iti pravilayaṃ prāṇānāṃ pratijñāya tat siddhaye
GSP33brssbh4u:730: iti saśabdaparāmṛṣṭasya prakṛtasya utkrānti avadheḥ ucchvayanādīni samāmananti /
GSP33brssbh4u:733: tat sāmānyāt 'na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmantyatraiva samavanīyante' iti atra api abheda upacāreṇa dehāpādānasya eva utkramaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:734: yadi api prādhānyaṃ dehina iti vyākhyeyaṃ yeṣāṃ pañcamī pāṭhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:735: yeṣāṃ tu ṣaṣṭhīpāṭhaḥ teṣāṃ vidvat saṃbandhini utkrāntiḥ pratiṣidhyata iti prāpta utkrāntipratiṣedhārthatvāt asya vākyasya dehapādāna eva sā pratiṣiddhā bhavati,
GSP33brssbh4u:737: api ca 'cakṣuṣo vā mūrdhno vānyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhyastamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo 'nūtkrāmati prāṇo 'nūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.2)
GSP33brssbh4u:738: iti evam avidvat viṣayaṃ saprapañcam utkramaṇaṃ saṃsāragamanaṃ ca darśayitvā 'iti nu kāmayamānaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.6)
GSP33brssbh4u:740: iti vyapadiśya vidvāṃsaṃ yadi tat viṣaye api utkrāntameva prāpadeyasamañjasa eva vyapadeśaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:741: tasmāt avidviṣaye prāptayoḥ gati utkrāntyoḥ vidvat viṣaye pratiṣedha iti evameva vyākhyeyaṃ vyapadeśārthavattvāya /
GSP33brssbh4u:742: na ca brahmavidaḥ sarvagatabrahmātmabhūtasya prakṣīṇakāmakarmaṇa utkrāntiḥ gatiḥ vā upapadyate nimitta abhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:743: 'atra brahma samaśnute' iti ca evañjātīyakāḥ śrutayo gati utkrāntyoḥ abhāvaṃ sūcayanti // 13 //
GSP33brssbh4u:745: smaryate api ca mahābhārate gati utkrāntyoḥ abhāvaḥ - 'sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya samyagbhūtāni paśyataḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:746: devā api mārge muhyantyapadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:747: nanu gatiḥ iti brahmavidaḥ sarvagatabrahmātmabhūtasya smaryate 'śukaḥ kila vaiyāsakirmumukṣurādityamaṇḍalamabhipratasthe pitrā cānugamyāhūto bho iti pratiśuśrāva' iti / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:748: saśarīrasya eva ayaṃ yogabalena viśiṣṭadeśaprāptipūrvakaḥ śarīra utsarga iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:750: na hi aśarīraṃ gacchantaṃ sarvabhūtāni draṣṭuṃ śaknuyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:751: tathā ca tatra evaupasaṃhṛtam- 'śukastu mārutācchīghrāṃ gatiṃ kṛtvāntarikṣagaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:756: tāni pare tathā hy āha / BBs_4,2.15 /
GSP33brssbh4u:757: tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditāni indriyāṇi bhūtāni ca parabrahmavidaḥ tasmin eva parasmin ātmani pralīyante /
GSP33brssbh4u:759: tathā hi āha śrutiḥ - 'evamevāsya paridraṣṭurimāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti (praśna. 6.5) iti.
GSP33brssbh4u:761: iti vidvat viṣaya eva aparā śrutiḥ parasmāt ātmanaḥ anyatra api kalānāṃ pralayam āha sma / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:763: pārthivādyāḥ kalāḥ pṛthivyādiḥ eva svaprakṛtīḥ apīyanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:765: kṛtsnaṃ kalājātaṃ parabrahmavido brahma eva saṃpadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:769: sa puna- viduṣaḥ kalāpralayaḥ kim itareṣām iva sāvaśeṣo bhavati āhosvit niravaśeṣa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:770: tatra pralayasāmānyāt śakti avaśeṣatāprasaktau bravīti - avibhāgāpattiḥ eva iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:772: tathā hi kalāpralayam uktvā vakti - 'bhidyate tāsāṃ nāmarūpe puruṣa ityevaṃ procyate sa eṣo 'kalo 'mṛto bhavati' (pra. 6.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:773: avidyā nimittānāṃ ca kalānāṃ na vidyānimitte pralaye sāvaśeṣatva upapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:776: tadokograjvalanaṃ tatprakāśitadvāro vidyāsāmarthyāt taccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogāc ca hārdānugṛhītāḥ śatādhikayā / BBs_4,2.17 /
GSP33brssbh4u:779: samānā ca asṛti upakramāt vidvat aviduṣoḥ utkrāntiḥiti uktaṃ tam idānīṃ sati upakramaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:780: tasya upasaṃhṛtavāgādi kalāpasya uccikramiṣato vijñānātmana oka āyatanaṃ hṛdayam 'sa etāstejomātrāḥ samabhyādadāno hṛdayamevānvavakrāmati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:781: tat agraprajvalanapūrvikā cakṣurādisthāna apādānā ca utkrāntiḥ śrūyate - 'tasya haitasya
GSP33brssbh4u:782: hṛdayasyāgraṃ pradyotate tena pradyotenaiṣa ātmā niṣkrāmati cakṣuṣo vā mūrdhno vānyebhyo
GSP33brssbh4u:784: sā kim aniyamena eva vidvat aviduṣoḥ bhavati atha asti kaścit viduṣo viśeṣaniyama
GSP33brssbh4u:785: iti vicikitsāyāṃ śruti aviśeṣāt aniyamaprāptau ācaṣṭe - samā api hi vidvat aviduṣoḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:786: hṛdayāgrapradyotane tat prakāśitadvāratve ca mūrdhasthānāt eva vidvān niṣkrāmati
GSP33brssbh4u:789: yadi vidvān apītaravat yataḥ kutaścit dehadeśāt utkrāmeta na eva utkṛṣṭaṃ lokaṃ labheta /
GSP33brssbh4u:791: tat śeṣagati anusmṛtiyogāt ca vidyāśeṣabhūtā ca mūrdhani anāḍīsaṃbaddhā gatiḥ anuśīlayitavyā vidyāviśeṣeṣu vihitā tām abhyasyan tasya eva pratiṣṭhita iti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:792: tasmāt hṛdayālayena brahmaṇā su upāsitena anugṛhītaḥ tadbhāvaṃ samāpanno vidvān mūrdhanyayā eva śatādhikayā śatāt atiriktayā ekaśatatamyā nāḍyā niṣkrāmati itarābhiḥ itare /
GSP33brssbh4u:793: tathā hi hārdavidyāṃ prakṛtya samāmananti - 'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyastāsāṃ mūrdhānamabhiniḥsṛtaikā /
GSP33brssbh4u:797: asti hārdavidyā - 'atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma' (chā. 8.1.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:799: tat prakriyāyām 'atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ' (chā. 8.6.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:800: iti upakramya saprapañcaṃ nāḍīraśmisaṃbandham uktvā uktam 'atha yatraitadasmāccharīrādutkrāmatyathaitaireva raśmibhirūrdhvamākramate' (chā. 8.6.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:802: tasmāt śatādhikayā nāḍyā niṣkrāman raśmi anusārī niṣkrāmati iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:803: tat kiṃm aviśeṣeṇa eva ahani rātrau vā mriyamāṇasya raśmi anusāritvam āhosvit ahani eva iti saṃśaye sati aviśeṣaśravaṇāt aviśeṣeṇa eva tāvat raśmi anusāri iti pratijñāyate // 18 //
GSP33brssbh4u:804: niśi neti cen na sambandhasya yāvaddehabhāvitvād darśayati ca / BBs_4,2.19 /
GSP33brssbh4u:805: asti ahani nāḍīraśmisaṃbandha iti ahani mṛtasya syāt raśmi anusāritvaṃ rātrau tu pretasya na syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:809: darśayati ca etamarthaṃ śrutiḥ - 'amuṣmādādityātpratāyante tā āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante te 'muṣminnāditye sṛptāḥ' (chā. 8.6.2)
GSP33brssbh4u:810: iti nidāghasamaye ca niśāsu api kiraṇa anuvṛttiḥ upalabhyate pratāpādikāryadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:811: stoka anuvṛtteḥ tu durlakṣyatvam ṛtvantararajanīṣu śaiśireṣu iva durdineṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:813: yadi ca rātrau preto vinā eva raśmi anusāreṇa ūrdhvam ākrameta raśmi anusāra ānarthakyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh4u:814: na hi etat viśiṣya adhīyate yo divā praiti sa raśmīn apekṣya ūrdvam ākramate yaḥ tu rātrau saḥ anapekṣya eva iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:815: atha tu vidvān api rātriprāyaṇa aparādhamātreṇa na ūrdhvam ākrameta pākṣikaphalā vidyā iti apravṛttiḥ eva tasyāṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:817: atha api rātrau uparataḥ aharāgamam udīkṣeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:818: aharāgame api asya kadācit araśmisaṃbandhārhaṃ śarīraṃ syāt pāvakādisaṃparkāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:821: tasmāt tat aviśeṣeṇa eva idaṃ rātridivaṃ raśmi anusāritvam // 19 //
GSP33brssbh4u:824: ata eva ca udīkṣā anupapatteḥ apākṣikaphalatvāt ca vidyāyā aniyatakālatvāt ca mṛtyoḥ dakṣiṇa ayane api mriyamāṇo vidvān prāpnoti eva vidyāphalam
GSP33brssbh4u:825: uttarāyaṇa maraṇa prāśasti aprasiddherbhīṣmasya ca pratīkṣādarśanāt 'āpūryamāṇapakṣādyānṣaḍudaṅṅeti māsāṃstān' (chā. 4.15.5)
GSP33brssbh4u:826: iti ca śruteḥ apekṣitavyam uttarāyaṇam iti imām āśaṅkām anena sūtreṇa apanudati /
GSP33brssbh4u:829: śruteḥ tu arthaṃ vakṣyati 'ātivāhikāstalliṅgāt' (bra. sū. 4.3.4) iti // 20 //
GSP33brssbh4u:830: nanu ca - 'yatra kāle tvanāvṛttimāvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:831: prayātā yānti taṃ phalaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha' (gī. 8.23)
GSP33brssbh4u:832: iti kālaprādhānyena upakramya aharādikālaviśeṣaḥ smṛtau apunarāvṛttaye niyamitaḥ kathaṃ rātrau dakṣiṇāyane vā prayāto anāvṛttiṃ yāyāditi /
GSP33brssbh4u:834: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryete smārte caite / BBs_4,2.21 /
GSP33brssbh4u:835: yoginaḥ prati ca ayam aharādikālaviniyogaḥ anāvṛttaye smaryate /
GSP33brssbh4u:836: smārte ca ete yogasāṃkhye na śraute /
GSP33brssbh4u:837: ato viṣayabhedāt pramāṇāviśeṣāt ca na asya smārtasya kālaviniyogasya śrauteṣu vijñāneṣu avatāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:840: iti ca śrautau etau devayānapitṛyāṇau pratyabhijñāyete smṛtau api iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:842: iti smṛtau kālapratijñānāt virodham āśaṅkya parihāra uktaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:843: yadā punaḥ smṛtau api agnyādyā devatā eva ativāhikyo gṛhyante tadā na kaścit virodha iti // 21 //
GSP33brssbh4u:844: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavataḥ kṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye caturthādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // 2 // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brssbh4u:846: atra pāde saguṇavidyāvato mṛtasya uttaramārga abhidhānam
GSP33brssbh4u:849: āsṛti upakramāt samāna utkrāntiḥ iti uktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:854: 'yadā vai puruṣo 'smāllokātpraiti sa vāyumāgacchati' (bṛ. 5.10.1) iti aparā /
GSP33brssbh4u:857: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ parasparaṃ bhinnā etāḥ sṛtaya kiṃ va eka eva anekaviśeṣaṇa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:858: tatra prāptaṃ tāvat bhinnāḥ etāḥ sṛtaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:863: tvarāvacanaṃ ca pīḍyeta 'sa yāvatkṣipyenmanastāvadādityaṃ gacchati' (chā. 8.6.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:864: tasmāt anyonyabhinnā eva ete panthāna iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:865: evaṃ prāpte abhidadhmahe - arcirādina iti - sarvo brahmaprepsuḥ arcirādina eva adhvanā raṃhati iti pratijānīmahe /
GSP33brssbh4u:867: prathito hi eṣa mārgaḥ sarveṣāṃ viduṣām /
GSP33brssbh4u:868: tathā hi pañcāgnividyāprakaraṇe 'ye 'cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' (bṛ. 6.2.15)
GSP33brssbh4u:869: iti vidyāntaraśīlinām api arcirādikā sṛtiḥ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:871: yāsu vidyāsu na kācit gatiḥ ucyate tāsu iyam arcirādika upatiṣṭhatāṃ yāsu tu anyā śrāvyate tāsu kim iti arcirādi āśrayaṇam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:872: atra ucyate - bhavet etadevaṃ yadi atyantabhinnā eva etāḥ sṛtayaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:873: eka eva tu eṣā sṛtiḥanekaviśeṣaṇā brahmalokaprapadanī kvacit kenacit viśeṣaṇena upalakṣita iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:875: prakaraṇabhede api hi vidyā ekatve bhavati itaretara viśeṣaṇa upasaṃhāravat gativiśeṣaṇānām api upasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:876: vidyābhede api tu gati ekadeśapratyabhijñānāt gantavya abhedāt ca gati abheda eva /
GSP33brssbh4u:877: tathā hi 'te teṣu brahmalokeṣu parāḥ parāvato vasanti' (bṛ. 6.2.15)
GSP33brssbh4u:879: 'sā yā brahmaṇo jitiryā vyuṣṭistāṃ jitiṃ jayati tāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ vyaśnute' (kauṣī. 1.4)
GSP33brssbh4u:881: iti ca tatra tatra tat eva ekaṃ phalaṃ brahmalokaprāptilakṣaṇaṃ pradarśyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:882: yat tu etaiḥ eva iti avadhāraṇam arcirādi āśrayaṇe na syāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:885: na hi eka eva śabdo raśmīn ca prāpayitum arhati arcirādīn ca vyāvartayitum /
GSP33brssbh4u:886: tasmāt raśmisaṃbandha eva ayamavadhāryata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:887: tvarāvacanaṃ tu arcirādi apekṣāyām api gantavyāntarāpekṣā śaighryārthatvāt na uparudhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:890: iti mārgadvayabhraṣṭānāṃ kaṣṭaṃ tṛtīyaṃ sthānam ācakṣāṇā pitṛyāṇavyatiriktam ekameva devayānam arcirādiparvāṇaṃ panthānaṃ prathayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:891: bhūyāṃsi arcirādisṛtau mārgaparvāṇi alpīyāṃsi tu anyatra /
GSP33brssbh4u:892: bhūyasāṃ ca anuguṇyena alpīyasāṃ nayanaṃ nyāyyam iti ataḥ api arcirādinā tat prathiteḥ iti uktam // 1 //
GSP33brssbh4u:895: kena punaḥ saṃniveśaviśeṣeṇa gativiśeṣāṇānām itaretara viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti tat etat suhṛt bhūtvā ācāryo grathayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:896: 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadyāgnilokamāgacchati sa vāyulokaṃ sa indralokaṃ sa prajāpatilokaṃ sa brahmalokam'(kau. 1.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:898: tatra arciḥ agnilokaśabdau tāvat ekārthau jvalanavacanatvāt iti na atra saṃniveśakramaḥ kvacit anveṣyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:899: vāyuḥ tu arcirādau vartmani na śrutaḥ katam asmin sthāne niveśayitavya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:901: iti atra saṃvatsarāt parāñcam ādityāt arvāñcaṃ vāyum abhisaṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:905: iti atrāviśeṣa upadiṣṭasya vāyoḥ śrutyantare viśeṣa upadośo dṛśyate 'yadā vai puruṣo
GSP33brssbh4u:906: 'smāllokātpraiti sa vāyumāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya khaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:907: tena sa ūrdhvamākramate sa ādityamāgacchati' (bṛ. 5.101) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:908: etasmāt ādityāt vāyoḥ pūrvatvadarśanāt viśeṣāt abda ādityayoḥ antarāle vāyuḥ niveśayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:909: kasmāt punaḥ agneḥ paratvadarśanāt viśeṣāt arciṣaḥ anantaraṃ vāyuḥ na niveśyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:910: na eṣaḥ asti viśeṣa iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:911: nanu udāhṛtā śrutiḥ - 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadyāgnilokamāgacchati sa vāyulokaṃ sa varuṇalokam' (kauṣī. 1.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:912: ucyate - kevala- atra pāṭhaḥ paurvāparyeṇāvasthito na atra kramavacanaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:914: padārtha upadarśanamātraṃ hi atra kriyate etam etaṃ ca āgacchati iti itaratra punaḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:915: vāyuprattena rathacakramātreṇa cchidreṇa ūrdhvam ākramya ādityam āgacchati iti avagamyate kramaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:919: tatra ādityān antaryāya devalokāt vāyum abhisaṃbhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:920: vāyum abdāt iti tu chandogaśruti apekṣayā uktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:921: chāndogya vājasaneyakayoḥ tu ekatra devaloko na vidyate paratra saṃvatsaraḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:922: tatra śrutidvayapratyayāt ubhau api ubhayatra grathayitavyau /
GSP33brssbh4u:923: tatra api māsasaṃbandhāt saṃvatsaraḥ pūrvaḥ paścimo devaloka iti vivektavyam // 2 //
GSP33brssbh4u:927: iti asyā vidyuta upariṣṭāt sa varuṇalokam iti ayaṃ varuṇaḥ saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:929: yadā hi viśāla avidyutaḥ tīvraḥ tanitaniḥ ghoṣā jīmūta udareṣu pranṛtyanti āthāpaḥ prapatanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:932: apāṃ ca adhipatiḥ varuṇa iti śrutismṛtiprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:933: varuṇāt adhīndraprajāpatī sthānāntara abhāvāt pāṭhasāmarthyāt ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:934: ānantukatvāt api varuṇādīnām anta eva niveśo vaiśeṣikasthānābhāvāt vidyut ca antya arcirādau vartmani // 3 //
GSP33brssbh4u:937: teṣu eva arcirādiṣu saṃśayaḥ - kim etāni mārgacihnāni uta bhogabhūmayaḥ athavā netāro gantṛṇām iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:938: tatra mārgalakṣaṇabhūtā arcirādaya iti tāvat prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:940: yathā hi loke kaścit grāmaṃ nagaraṃ vā pratiṣṭhāsamānaḥ anuśiṣyate gacchetaḥ tvam
GSP33brssbh4u:941: amuṃ giriṃ tato nyagrodhaṃ tato nadīṃ tato grāmaṃ tato nagaraṃ vā prāpsyasi iti evam
GSP33brssbh4u:942: iha api arciṣo aharahna āpūryamāṇapakṣim ityādi āha /
GSP33brssbh4u:945: lokaśabdaḥ ca prāṇināṃ bhogāyataneṣu bhāṣyate - 'manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devalokaḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.16) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:946: tathā ca brāhmaṇam - 'ahorātreṣu te lokeṣu sajjante' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh4u:949: cetanā hi loke rājaniyuktāḥ puruṣā durgeṣu mārgeṣu ativāhyān ativāhayanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:950: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ātivāhikā eva ete bhavitum arhanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:952: tathā hi 'candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa etānbrahma gamayati' (chā. 4.15.5)
GSP33brssbh4u:954: tat vacanaṃ tat viṣayam eva upakṣīṇam iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:956: yadi arcirādiṣu puruṣā gamayitāraḥ prāptāḥ te ca mānavāḥ tato yuktaṃ tat nivṛttyarthaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṇam amānava iti // 4 //
GSP33brssbh4u:960: ye tāvat arcirādimārgāḥ te dehaviyogāt saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇagrāmā iti asvatantrā arcirādīnām
GSP33brssbh4u:961: api acetanatvāt asvātantryam iti ataḥ arcirādi abhimāninaḥ cetanā devatāviśeṣā atiyātrāyāṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:963: loke api hi matta mūrcchitādayaḥ saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇāḥ paraprayuktavartmāno bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:964: anavasthitatvāt api arcirādīnāṃ na mārgalakṣaṇatva upapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:965: na hi rātrau pretasya ahaḥsvarūpa abhisaṃbhava upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:966: na ca pratipālanamasti iti uktaṃ purastāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:967: dhruvatvāt tu devatā ātmānāṃ na ayaṃ doṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:968: arcirādi śabdatā ca eṣām arcirādi abhimānāt upapadyate 'arciṣo 'haḥ'(chā. 4.15.5, 5,10.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:969: ityādinirdeśaḥ tu ativāhikatve api na virudhyate arciṣā hetunā ahaḥ abhisaṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:971: tathā ca loke prasiddheṣu api ativāhikeṣu evañjātīyaka upadeśo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:972: gaccha tvam ito balavarmāṇaṃ tato jayasiṃhaṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇaguptam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:976: iti saṃbandhaviśeṣaḥ ativāhi ativāhakatva lakṣaṇa uktaḥ tena sa eva upakrame api iti nirdhāryate /
GSP33brssbh4u:977: saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇatvāt eva ca gantṛṣu na tatra upabhogasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:978: lokaśabdaḥ tu anupabhuñjāneṣu api gantṛṣu gamayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:980: ataḥ agnisvāmikaṃ lokaṃ prāptaḥ agninā ativāhyate vāyusvāmikaṃ prāpto vāyunā iti yojayitavyam // 5 //
GSP33brssbh4u:982: vidyuto hi adhi varuṇādaya upakṣiptā vidyutaḥ tu anantaramā brahmaprāpteḥ amānavasya eva puruṣasya gamayitṛtvaṃ śrutam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:985: tato vidyut abhisaṃbhavanāt ūrdhvaṃ vidyut anantaravartina eva amānavena puruṣeṇa varuṇalokādiṣu ativāhyamānā brahmalokaṃ gacchanti iti avagantavyam
GSP33brssbh4u:986: 'tānvaidyutātpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa etya brahmalokaṃ gamayati' iti tasya eva gamayitṛtvaśruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:987: varuṇādayaḥ tu tasya eva apratibandhakaraṇena sāhāyya anuṣṭhānena vā kenacit anugrāhakā iti avagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:988: tasmāt sādhu uktam ativāhikā devatātmānaḥ arcirādaya iti // 6 //
GSP33brssbh4u:992: iti atra vicikitsyate - kiṃ kāryam aparaṃ brahma gamayati āhosvit param eva avikṛtaṃ mukhyaṃ brahma iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:995: tatra kāryameva saguṇam aparaṃ brahma enān gamayati amānavaḥ puruṣa iti bādariḥ ācāryo manyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:998: asya hi kāryabrahmaṇo gantavyatvam upapadyate pradeśavattvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:999: na tu parasmin brahmaṇi gantṛtvaṃ gantavyatvaṃ gatiḥ vā avakalpate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1002: brahmalokāngamayati te teṣu brahmalokeṣu parāḥ parāvato vasanti' (bṛ. 6.2.15)
GSP33brssbh4u:1003: iti ca śrutyantare viśeṣitatvāt kāryabrahmaviṣaya eva gatiḥ iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1004: nahi bahuvacanena viśeṣaṇaṃ parasmin brahmaṇi avakalpate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1005: kārye tu avasthābheda upapatteḥ saṃbhavati bahuvacanam /
GSP33brssbh4u:1006: lokaśrutiḥ api vikāragocarāyāma eva saṃniveśaviśiṣṭāyāṃ bhogabhūmāvau āñjasī /
GSP33brssbh4u:1007: gauṇī tu anyatra 'brahmaiva loka eṣa samrāṭ' ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:1008: adhikaraṇa adhikartavyanirdeśaḥ api parasmin brahmaṇi anāñjasaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1010: nanu kāryaviṣaye api brahmaśabdo na upapadyate samanvaye hi samastasya jagato janmādikāraṇaṃ sthāpitam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1014: parabrahmasāmīpyāt aparasya brahmaṇaḥ tasmin api brahmaśabdaprayogo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1015: param eva hi brahma viśuddha upādhisaṃbandhaṃ kvacit kaiścit vikāradharmaiḥ manomayatvādibhiḥ upāsanāya upadiśyamānam aparam iti sthitiḥ //
GSP33brssbh4u:1017: na hi parasmāt brahmaṇaḥ anyatra kvacit nityatāṃ saṃbhāvayanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1018: darśayati ca devayānena pathā prasthitānām anāvṛttim /
GSP33brssbh4u:1020: iti teṣām iha na punarāvṛttiḥ asti 'tayordhvamāyannamṛtatvameti' (chā. 8.6.6), ka. 6.16) iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:1022: kāryātyaye tadadhyakṣeṇa sahātaḥ param abhidhānāt / BBs_4,3.10 /
GSP33brssbh4u:1023: kāryabrahmalokapralayapratyupasthāne sati tatra eva utpannasamyagdarśanāḥ santaḥ tat adhyakṣeṇa hiraṇyagarbheṇa sahātaḥ paraṃ pariśuddhaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ pratipadyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1025: na hi āñjasa eva gatipūrvikā paraprāptiḥ saṃbhavati iti upapaditam // 10 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1027: smṛtiḥ api etam artham anujānāti - 'brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare /
GSP33brssbh4u:1029: tasmāt kāryabrahmaviṣayā gatiḥ śrūyata iti siddhāntaḥ // 11 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1030: kaṃ puna- pūrvapakṣam āśaṅkya ayaṃ siddhāntaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ 'kāryaṃ bādariḥ' (bra.sū. 4.3.7)
GSP33brssbh4u:1035: iti atra parameva brahma prāpayati iti manyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1037: paraṃ hi brahma brahmaśabdasya mukhyam ālambanaṃ,
GSP33brssbh4u:1043: amṛtatvaṃ ca parasmin brahmaṇi upapadyate na kārye,
GSP33brssbh4u:1047: paraviṣaya eva ca eṣā gatiḥ kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1048: na hi tatra vidyāntaraprakramaḥ asti 'anyatra dharmādanyatrādharmāt' (ka. 2.14)
GSP33brssbh4u:1052: iti na ayaṃ kāryaviṣayaḥ pratipatti abhisaṃdhiḥ 'nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1053: iti kāryavilakṣaṇasya parasya eva brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1058: iti ca parasya eva brahmaṇo yaśonāmatva prasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1059: 'sā ceyaṃ veśmapratipattirgatipūrvikā hārdavidyāyāmuditā tadaparājitā pūrbrahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayam' (chā. 8.5.3) iti atra /
GSP33brssbh4u:1060: paderapi ca gatyarthatvāt mārga apekṣā avasīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1062: tau etau dvau pakṣau ācāryeṇa sūtritau gati upapattyādibhiḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:1064: tatra gati upapattyādayaḥ prabhavanti mukhyatvādīna ābhāsayituṃ na tu mukhyatvādayo gati upapattyādīn ityādya eva siddhānto vyākhyāto dvitīyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1065: na hi asati api saṃbhave mukhyasya eva arthasya grahaṇam iti kaścit ājñāpayitā vidyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1066: paravidyāprakaraṇe api ca tat stutyarthaṃ vidyāntara āśrayagati anukīrtanam upapadyate 'viṣvaṅṅanyā utkramaṇe bhavanti' (chā. 8.6.6) itivat
GSP33brssbh4u:1068: iti tu pūrvavākyavicchedena kārye api pratipatti abhisaṃdhiḥ na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1069: saguṇe api ca brahmaṇi sarvātmatva saṃkīrtanaṃ sarvakarmā sarvakāma ityādivat avakalpate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1071: kecit punaḥ pūrvāṇi pūrvapakṣasūtrāṇi bhavanti uttarāṇi siddhāntasūtrāṇi iti etāṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:1072: vyavasthānam anurudhyamānāḥ paraviṣayā eva gatiśrutīḥ pratiṣṭhāpayanti tat anupapannaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:1074: yat sarvagataṃ sarvāntaraṃ sarvātmakaṃ ca paraṃ brahma 'ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ' 'yatsākṣādaparokṣādbrahma' (bṛ. 3.4.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1078: ityādi śrutinirdhārita viśeṣaṃ tasya gantavyatā na kadācit api upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1080: anyo hi anyat gacchati iti prasiddhaṃ loke /
GSP33brssbh4u:1081: nanu loke gatasya api gantavyatā deśāntaraviśiṣṭā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1082: yathā pṛthivīstha eva pṛthivīṃ deśāntaradvāreṇa gacchati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1083: tathā ananyatve api sarvaśakti upetatvāt kathañcit gantavyatā syāt iti / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:1090: ityādi śruti smṛti nyāyebhyo na deśakālādi viśeṣayogaḥ paramātmani kalpayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1091: yena bhūpradeśa vayovasthā nyāyena asya gantavyatā syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1092: bhūvayasoḥ tu pradeśa avasthādi viśeṣayogāt upapadyate deśa kāla viśiṣṭā gantavyatā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1093: jagat utpatti sthiti pralayahetutva śruteḥ anekaśaktitvaṃ brahmaṇa iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:1095: utpattyādiśrutīnām api samānam ananyārthatvam iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:1097: mṛdādi dṛṣṭāntaiḥ hi sato brahmaṇa ekasya satyatvaṃ vikārasya ca āvṛtatvaṃ pratipādayat śāstraṃ na utpattyādiparaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1098: kasmāt punaḥ utpattyādi śrutīnāṃ viśeṣatvaṃ na punaḥ itara śeṣatvam itarāsām iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1100: na hi ātmana ekatva nityatva śuddhatvādi avagatau satyāṃ bhūyaḥ kācit ākāṅkṣā upajāyate puruṣārthasamāptibuddhi upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1104: etaṃ ha vāva na tapati kimahaṃ sādhu nākaravaṃ kimahaṃ pāpamakaravam' (taitti. 2.9.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1106: tathā eva ca viduṣāṃ tuṣṭi anubhavādi darśanāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1107: vikāra anṛta abhisaṃdhi apavādāt ca 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1108: ato na viśeṣanirākaraṇa śrutīnām anyaśeṣatvam avagantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1109: na evam utpattyādi śrutīnāṃ nirākāṅkṣārtha pratipādanasāmarthyam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1111: tathā hi 'tatraitacchruṅgamutpatitaṃ somya vijānīhi nedamamūlaṃ bhaviṣyati' (chā. 6.8.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:1112: iti upanyasya udarke sata eva ekasya jagat mūlasya vijñeyatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1117: evam utpattyādiśrutīnām aikātmya avagamaparatvāt na anekaśaktiyogo brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1120: iti ca parasmin brahmaṇi gatiṃ nivārayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1122: gatikalpanāyāṃ ca gantā jīvo gantavyasya brahmaṇaḥ avayavo vikāro vā tataḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1126: yadi ekadeśaḥ tena ekadeśino nityaprāptatvāt na punaḥ brahmagamanam upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1127: ekadeśitva kalpanā ca brahmaṇi anupapannā niravayavatva prasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1128: vikārapakṣe api etat atulyaṃ vikāreṇa api vikāriṇo nityaprāptatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1129: na hi ghaṭo mṛdātmatāṃ parityajya avatiṣṭhate parityāge vā abhāvaprāpteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1130: vikāra avayavapakṣayoḥ ca tadvataḥ sthiratvāt brahmaṇaḥ saṃsāragamanam api anavakḷptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:1132: saḥ aṇuḥ vyāpī madyama parimāṇo vā bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1136: pratiṣiddhe ca aṇutva madhyama parimāṇatve vistareṇa purastāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1139: vikāra avayavapakṣayoḥ api samānaḥ ayaṃ doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1140: vikāra avayavayoḥ tadvatoḥ ananyatvāt adoṣa iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:1146: yat tu kaiścit jalpyate nityāni naimittikāni karmāṇi anuṣṭhīyante pratyavāya anutpattaye
GSP33brssbh4u:1147: kāmyāni pratiṣiddhāni ca parihriyante svarganarakān avāptaye sāṃpratadeha upabhogyāni
GSP33brssbh4u:1148: ca karmāṇi upabhogena eva kṣapyanta ityato vartamānadehapātāt ūrdhvaṃ dehāntara pratisaṃdhāna
GSP33brssbh4u:1149: kāraṇa abhāvāt svarūpa avasthānalakṣaṇaṃ kaivalyaṃ vinā api brahmātmataya evaṃvṛttasya setsyati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1152: na hi etat śāstreṇa kenacit pratipāditaṃ mokṣārthi itthaṃ samācaret iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1153: svamanīṣayā tu etat tarkitaṃ yasmāt karmanimittaḥ saṃsāraḥ tasmāt nimitta abhāvāt na bhaviṣyati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1154: na ca etat tarkayitum api śakyate nimitta abhāvasya durjñānatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1155: bahūni hi karmāṇi jātyantarasaṃcitāni iṣṭa aniṣṭavipākāni ekaikasya jantoḥ saṃbhāvyante /
GSP33brssbh4u:1156: teṣāṃ viruddha phalānāṃ yugapat upabhoga asaṃbhavāt kānicit labdha avasarāṇi idaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:1157: janma nirmimate kānicit tu deśakālanimittapratīkṣāṇi asata iti ataḥ teṣām avaśiṣṭānāṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:1158: sāṃpratena upabhogena kṣapaṇāsaṃbhavāt na yathāvarṇitacaritasya api vartamānadehapāte
GSP33brssbh4u:1160: karmaśeṣasadbāvasiddhaḥ ca 'tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇāstataḥ śeṣeṇa' ityādi śruti smṛtibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1162: nitya naimittikāni teṣāṃ kṣepakāṇi bhaviṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1166: na ca janmāntara saṃcitānāṃ sukṛtānāṃ nitya naimittikaiḥ asti virodhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1168: duritānāṃ tu aśuddhirūpatvāt sati virodhe bhavatu kṣapaṇaṃ na tu tāvatā dehāntara nimitta abhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1171: na ca nitya naimittikānuṣṭhānāt pratyavāya anutpattimātraṃ na punaḥ phalāntara utpattiḥ iti pramāṇam asti phalāntarasya api anuniṣpādinaḥ saṃbhavāt
GSP33brssbh4u:1172: smarati hi āpastambaḥ - 'tadyathāmre phalārte nimitte chāyāgandhāvanūtpadyete evaṃ dharmaṃ caryamāṇārthā anūtpadyante' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1173: na ca asati samyak darśane sarvātmanā kāmyapratiṣiddhavarjanaṃ janmaprāyaṇāntarālaṃ kenacit pratijñātuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:1175: saṃśayitavyaṃ tu bhavati tathā api nimitta abhāvasya durjñānatvameva /
GSP33brssbh4u:1176: na ca anabhyupagamyamāne jñānagamye brahmātmatve kartṛtva bhoktṛtva svabhāvasya ātmanaḥ kaivalyam ākāṅkṣituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:1179: kartṛtva bhoktṛtva kāryam anartho na tat śaktiḥ tena śakti avasthāne 'pi kāryaparihārat upapanno mokṣa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1182: atha api syāt na kevalā śaktiḥ kāryam ārabhate anapekṣya anyāni nimittāni /
GSP33brssbh4u:1183: ata ekākinī sā sthitāpi na aparādhyati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1186: tasmāt kartṛtva bhoktṛtva svabhāve satyām anyasatyāṃ vidyāgamyāyāṃ brahmātmatāyāṃ na kathañcana mokṣaṃ pratyāśā asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1189: parasmāt ananyatve api jīvasya sarvavyavahāra lopaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1190: pratyakṣādi pramāṇa apravṛtteḥ iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:1192: śāstraṃ ca 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati (bṛ. 2.4.14, 4.5.15)
GSP33brssbh4u:1193: ityādinā aprabuddhaviṣaye pratyakṣādi vyavahāram uktvā punaḥ prabuddhaviṣaye 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛ. 2.4.14,
GSP33brssbh4u:1195: tat evaṃ parabrahmavido gantavyādi vijñānasya bādhitatvāt na kathañcana gatiḥ upapādayituṃ śakyā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1198: tathā hi kvacit pañcāgnividyāṃ prakṛtya gatiḥ ucyate yathā 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' (chā. 4.10.5)
GSP33brssbh4u:1200: iti ca tatra api vāmanītvādibhiḥ satyakāmādibhiḥ ca guṇaiḥ saguṇasya eva upāsyatvāt saṃbhavati gatiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1201: na kvacit parabrahmaviṣayā gatiḥ śrāvyate yathā gatipratiṣedhaḥ śrāvitaḥ 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1203: ityādiṣu tu satyapi āpnoteḥ gatyarthatve varṇitena nyāyena deśāntaraprāpti asaṃbhavāt
GSP33brssbh4u:1204: svarūpapratipattiḥ eva iyam avidyā adhyāropita nāma rūpa pravilaya apekṣayā abhidhīyate
GSP33brssbh4u:1207: api ca paraviṣayā gatiḥ vyākhyāyamānā prarocanāya vā syāt anucintanāya vā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1210: svasaṃvedyena eva avyavahitena vidyāsamarpitena svāsthyena tat siddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1211: na ca nityasiddhaniḥśreyasanivedanasya asādhyaphalasya vijñānasya gati anucintane kācit apekṣā upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1213: tatra para aparabrahmaviveka anavadhāraṇena aparasmin brahmaṇi vartamānā gatiśrutayaḥ parasmin adhyāropyante /
GSP33brssbh4u:1214: kiṃ dve brahmaṇī param aparaṃ ca iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1215: bāḍhaṃ dve 'etadvai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ brahmayadoṅkāraḥ' (pra. 5.2)
GSP33brssbh4u:1217: kiṃ punaḥ paraṃ brahma kim aparam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1219: yatra avidyākṛta nāma rūpādi viśeṣapratiṣedhāt asthūlādiśabdaiḥ brahma upadiśyate tat param /
GSP33brssbh4u:1220: tat eva yatra nāmarūpādiviśeṣeṇa kenacit viśiṣṭam upāsanāya upadiśyate 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bhārūpaḥ' (chā. 3.14.2)
GSP33brssbh4u:1224: tasya ca aparabrahma upāsanasya tat saṃnidhau śrūyamāṇam 'sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati' (chā. 8.2.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1225: ityādi jagat aiśvaryalakṣaṇaṃ saṃsāragocaram eva phalaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1227: tasya ca deśaviśeṣa avabaddhatvāt tatprāptyarthaṃ gamanam aviruddham /
GSP33brssbh4u:1228: sarvagatatve api ca ātmana ākāśasya iva ghaṭādigamane budhyādi upādhigamane gamanaprasiddhiḥ iti avādiṣma 'tadguṇasāratvāt' (bra.sū. 2.3.29) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh4u:1232: iti tu pakṣāntarapratibhānamātrapradarśanaṃ prajñāvikāsanāya iti draṣṭavyam // 14 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1234: apratīkālambanān nayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā ca doṣāt tatkratuś ca / BBs_4,3.15 /
GSP33brssbh4u:1235: sthitam etat kāryaviṣayā gatiḥ na paraviṣayā iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1236: idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate kiṃ sarvān vikāra ālambanān aviśeṣeṇa eva amānavaḥ puruṣaḥ prāpayati brahmalokam uta kāṃścit eva iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1237: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ sarveṣām eva eṣāṃ viduṣām anyatra parasmāt brahṇaṇo gatiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1239: iti atrāviśeṣeṇa eva eṣāṃ vidyāntareṣu avatārita iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1240: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - apratīka ālambanān iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1241: pratīka ālambanān varjayitvā sarvān anyān vikāra ālambanān nayati brahmalokam iti bādarāyaṇa ācāryo manyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1244: aniyama nyāyasya pratīkavyatirikteṣu api upāsaneṣu upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1245: tatkratuḥ ca asya ubhayathābhāvasya samarthako hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1246: yo hi brahmakratuḥ sa brāhmam aiśvaryam āsīdediti śliṣyate 'taṃ yathā yatopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1247: na tu pratīkeṣu brahma akratutvam asti pratīkapradhānatvāt upāsanasya /
GSP33brssbh4u:1248: nanu abrahmakratuḥ api brahmagacchati iti śrūyate yathā pañcāgni vidyāyām 'sa enānbrahma gamayati' (chā. 4.15.5)
GSP33brssbh4u:1249: iti bhavatu yatra evam āhatyavāda upalabhyate tat abhāve tu autsargikeṇa tat kratunyāyena brahmakratūnām eva tatprāptiḥ na itareṣām iti gamyate
GSP33brssbh4u:1251: nāmādiṣu pratīka upāsaneṣu pūrvasmāt pūrvasmāt phalaviśeṣam uttarasmin uttarasmin upāsane darśayati - 'yāvannāmno gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati' (chā. 7.1.5)
GSP33brssbh4u:1256: sa ca ayaṃ phalaviśeṣaḥ pratīka tantratvāt upāsanānām upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1257: brahma tantratve tu brahmaṇaḥ aviśiṣṭatvāt kathaṃ phalaviśeṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1258: tasmāt na pratīka ālambanānām itaraiḥ tulyaphalatvam iti // 16 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1264: evam eva eṣa saṃprasādaḥ asmāt śarīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1265: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ devalokādi upabhogasthāneṣu iva āgantukena kenacit viśeṣeṇa abhiniṣpadyata āhot ātmamātreṇa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1267: sthānāntareṣu iva āgantukena kenacit rūpeṇa abhiniṣpattiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1270: svarūpamātreṇa cet abhiniṣpattiḥ pūrvāsu api avasthāsu svarūpa anāpāyāt vibhāvyeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:1272: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - kevalena eva ātmana āvirbhavati na dharmāntareṇa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1273: kutaḥ - svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata iti svaśabdāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1274: anyathā hi svaśabdena iti viśeṣaṇam anavakḷptaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1275: nanu ātmīya abhiprāyaḥ svaśabdo bhaviṣyati / na /
GSP33brssbh4u:1277: yena eva hi kenacit rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate tasya eva ātmīyatva upapatteḥ svena iti viśeṣaṇamna arthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1278: ātmavacanatāyāṃ tu arthavat kevalena eva ātmarūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate na āgantukena apararūpeṇāpi iti // 1 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1279: kaḥ punaḥ viśeṣaḥ pūrvāsu avasthāsu iha ca svarūpa anapāyasāmye sati ityata āha -
GSP33brssbh4u:1281: yaḥ atra abhiniṣpadyata iti uktaḥ sa sarvabandha vinirmuktaḥ śuddhena eva ātmanā avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1282: pūrvatra tu andho bhavati api roditi iva vināśameva apīto bhavati iti ca avasthātraya kaluṣitena ātmana iti ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1283: kathaṃ punaḥ avagamyate muktaḥ ayam idānīṃ bhavati iti - pratijñānāt ityāha /
GSP33brssbh4u:1285: iti avasthātraya doṣavihīnam ātmānaṃ vyākhyeyatvena pratijñāya 'aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ (chā. 8.12.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1286: iti ca upanyasya 'svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ' (chā. 8.12.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:1290: phalatvaprasiddhiḥ api mokṣasya bandhanivṛttimātra apekṣā na apūrva upajanana apekṣā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1291: yat api abhiniṣpadyata iti utpattiparyāyatvaṃ tat api pūrva avasthāpekṣaṃ yathā roganivṛttau arogaḥabhiniṣpadyata iti tadvat /
GSP33brssbh4u:1294: kathaṃ punaḥ mukta iti ucyate - yāvatā 'paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya' (chā. 8.12.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:1297: na ca anativṛtto vikāraviṣayāt kaścit mukto bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1300: yata jyotiḥ śabdena āvedyate prakaraṇāt 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyuḥ' (chā. 8.7.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1301: iti hi prakṛte parasmin ātmani na akasmāt bhautikaṃ jyotiḥ śakyaṃ grahītum /
GSP33brssbh4u:1303: jyotiḥśabdaḥ tu ātmani api dṛśyate 'taddevā jyotiṣaṃ jyotiḥ (bṛ. 4.4.16) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1307: paraṃ jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate yaḥ sa kiṃ parasmāt ātmanaḥ pṛthageva bhavati uta avibhāgena eva avatiṣṭhata vīkṣāyām sa 'tatra paryeti' ( 8.12.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:1308: iti adhikaraṇa adhikartavya nirdeśāt jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya (chā. 8.12.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:1309: iti ca kartṛkarmanirdeśāt bhedena eva avasthānam iti yasya matiḥ taṃ vyutpādayati avibhakta eva pareṇa ātmanā muktaḥ avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1315: iti evamādīni vākyāni avibhāgena eva paramātmānaṃ darśayanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1316: yathādarśanam eva ca phalaṃ yuktaṃ tatkratu nyāyāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1318: evaṃ muneḥ vijānata ātmā bhavati gautama' (ka. 4.15)
GSP33brssbh4u:1319: iti ca evamādīni muktasvarūpanirūpaṇaparāṇi vākyāni avibhāgameva darśayanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1328: iti atra ātmamātrarūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata na āgantukena apararūpeṇa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1329: adhunā tu tat viśeṣabubhutsāyām abhidhīyate svam asya rūpaṃ brāhmam apahatapāpmatvādi
GSP33brssbh4u:1330: satyasaṃkalpatva avasānaṃ tathā sarvajñatvaṃ sarveśvaratvaṃ ca tena svarūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata
GSP33brssbh4u:1335: iti evam antena upanyāsena evam ātmakatām ātmano bodhayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1338: 'tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' (chā. 7.25.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:1339: 'sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ' ityādi vyapadeśāḥ ca evam upapannā bhaviṣyanti iti // 5 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1341: yadyapi apahapāpmatvādayobhedena eva dharmā nirdiśyante tathā api śabdavikalpajā eva ete /
GSP33brssbh4u:1343: caitanyameva tu asya ātmanaḥ svarūpam iti tanmātreṇa svarūpeṇa abhiniṣpattiḥ yuktā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1344: tathā ca śrutiḥ - 'evaṃ vā are 'yamātmānantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva' (bṛ. 4.5.13)
GSP33brssbh4u:1346: satyakāmatvādayaḥ tu yadi api vastusvarūpeṇa eva dharmā ucyante satyāḥ kāmā asya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1347: tathā api upādhisaṃbandha adhīnatvāt teṣāṃ na caitanyavat svarūpasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1349: pratiṣiddhaṃ hi brahmaṇaḥ aneka ākāratvam 'na sthānato 'pi parasyobhayaliṅgam' (bra.sū, 3.2.11) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh4u:1350: ata eva ca jakṣaṇādi saṃkīrtanam api duḥkha abhāvamātra abhiprāyaṃ stutyartham ātmaratiḥ ityādivat /
